GSP28dhebta_u:295: tarhi tatraivādivākye kathaṃ pravṛttiḥ8 śrotṝṇām asati tasyādivākyasyābhidheyādyabhidhāyake vākyāntare' iti prṣṭodharmottarādirācaṣṭāṃ tāvat /

GSP28dhebta_u:308_2: purastāt sambhavī tato 'pi prakaraṇe pravṛttir avyāhateti darśayan 3tatraivābhyccaye
GSP28dhebta_u:309: evaṃ jijñāsoḥ [2.24] ity etajjijñāsāta ity arthāt /

GSP28dhebta_u:315: ata eva vyanakti -- asmadabhimatena vā [2.24] iti /

GSP28dhebta_u:318: yady evam artho vākyopanyāso vyarthas tarhi kim arthaṃvārtikakāreṇākārīty āśaṇkya tasmād [2.27] ityā5dinopasaṃhāravyājena phalam asya darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:320: kartuṃ pratipādayituṃ vā nārabhyate [2.28] nānuṣṭhīyata iti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ sambandhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:322: {p.243} itiḥ [3.2] pratiṣedhyasya tatkaraṇapratipādanānuṣṭhānalaksaṇasya vyāpakasyānupa6labdher ākāraṃ kathayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:325: yasyā udbhāvanaṃ pradarśanaṃ tad evārthaḥ prayojanam,
GSP28dhebta_u:326: tad yathā bhavatīty upanyasanakriyāyā viśeṣaṇam etat /
GSP28dhebta_u:328: asmāt khalu arthā ādāya ādāya vyākhyāyanta iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:329: syād etat -- vacana7syāsya bahir arthe prāmāṇyābhāvāt katham asau tadvacanāt tadasiddhatāṃ budhyate? /
GSP28dhebta_u:330: yadi parasmādasya tadviṣayo 'rthasaṃśayaḥ pravrttyaṅgaṃ jāyata iti tad eva matamāyātam iti kim anena masīmrakṣitakukkaṭanyāyenācariteneti /
GSP28dhebta_u:331_0: atrācaṣṭe -- kevalaṃ yaḥ pratipattā sati prayojanādau prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaṃ kartāraṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:331_1: 8niyamena ādau tadvādinaṃ manvānaḥ tadarthaṃ vacanam asyāpy apaśyann aprekṣāvatprayuktatvagarbhaprayojanādikam atrāpi jānīte,

GSP28dhebta_u:340: etad arthātmanopi saṃbhavāt prakaraṇātmana ity āha /

GSP28dhebta_u:344: vākyasya [3.6] ekasminn arthe prādhānyena pratipādye 'rthādvāreṇānyonyā3pekṣiṇa upakāryopakārakabhāvenāvasthitasya padasamūhasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:354: [5] parasparasaṃsargāt' S[ataḥ paraṃ sarvatra mudritahetubinduṭīkāyāḥS' iti saṃjñā bodhyā /]
GSP28dhebta_u:356: {p. 244} nanv etāvatāpi na jñāyate kotra samudāyārtho yasmin pratipādye amīṣāṃ parasparasambandhena vyāpāra ity āha tathāhi [3.8] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:357: nipātasamudāyaścāyaṃ yasmād ity asminn arthe sarvatra /
GSP28dhebta_u:359: yadi tacchabdena tat parāmṛṣyeta tadā tadabhidheyaṃ vyutpādyatayoktaṃ bhaved yāvatā tacchabdena tan na parāmṛṣṭam iti āha -- tasyaiva [3.9] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:362: tato 'yam arthaḥ -- yasmāt tacchabdena tasya sambandhaḥ svīkāraḥ tasmāt sambandhāt [3.9] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:367: syād etat -- ayaṃ khalu tacchabdo anantarapra6kāntaṃ pradhānaṃ parāmṛśan dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:376: [7] ṭīkāyāṃ prater atra truṭitatvātguṇabhūtam' iti kalpayitvā sthāpitaḥ pāṭhaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:381: pradhānasya saṃsparśaḥ svīkāraḥ sambandhaḥ iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:382: tena samaṃ vāstavasambandhāt tatparāmarśaḥ syādity āha -- śabdānām [3.12] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:385: kasaṃkāśe kiṃ mahāstrākarṣaṇaprāye8ṇeti manyamānas tadabhimataṃ prādhānyam eva darśayann āha -- pakṣe[3.13]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:386: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- yady api samāsārthopasarjanaṃ pratyavamrasṭum aśakyaṃ tathāpi vyutpādyatayā śāstre prakṛtatvāt buddhyantareṇa gṛhītaṃ svatantraṃ satpratyavamṛṣyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:390: {p. 245} yady evaṃ tadvyutpattyartham iti vaktavye ṇicā nirdeśena kiṃ prayojanam ity āha -- ata eva [3.15] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:391: yato 'numānavyutpattiḥ prakaraṇasya sādhyatvād eva prayojanaṃ nānyathā ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt prakaraṇasya vyāpāras tathārthābhidhānaṃ tad darśayituṃ[8][3.16] /
GSP28dhebta_u:392: kiṃrūpaṃ tad datśayitum ity āha -- anumāne[3.15]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:393: anumānavyutpattiḥ viṣayaḥ sādhyatvād ya2sya sa tathoktas taṃ darśayituṃ vyutpattiviṣayaṃ prayojakavyāpāraṃ darśayitum iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:400: evaṃ ca vyācaksāṇaḥ śiṣyasyānumānavyutpattau prakaraṇasya hetukartṛtāṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:403: sati caivaṃ kartuḥ śrotuś ca karaṇa-śravaṇaprayojanam api sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:404: athāsati sādhyasādhanasambandhābhidhāne kathaṃ tatpratītir yena tasya tatprayojanaṃ siddhim adhyāsītety āha -- tataś ca [3.17] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:408: nanu ca praṇetur jñānastham arthaṃ pratipādayitum ucyate na (ṃuccaritena)
GSP28dhebta_u:410: na hi anyathā tam arthaṃ pratipādyā(dyāḥ ā)
GSP28dhebta_u:412: tathā cārthābhidhānam evātra prayojakasya prakaraṇasya vyāpāraḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:415: tataś cāsyaivābhidhānārtham idam ārabhyata iti prasaktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:418: na tv asyaivābhidhānārtham iti codyaṃ pratividhātum abhyupagacchann āha -- yady api [3.18] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:419: śabdasya vṛttam vartanam pravṛttiḥ vyāpāra iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:420: tena śābdena nyā6yena prakaraṇavyāpārasya prādhānyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:421: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- śabdasya hi vyutpattiviṣayaḥ prayojakavyāpāro 'bhidheyaḥ pradhānaṃ ten tādarthyaṃ gamyeteti /
GSP28dhebta_u:422: yadīdam anumatam eva tarhi kim artham evam abhihitam ity āśaṅkya pratisamādhānam āha -- tathāpi [3.19] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:424: {p 246}vastuvṛttyāpi kathaṃ vyutpatteḥ prādhānyam ity āha tasyā [3.18] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:425: ayam āśayaḥ -- sarvo hi prayojakavyāpāraḥ prayojyakriyārthaḥ /

GSP28dhebta_u:429: sthānādibhiḥ prayojakas tadarthamātravyāpāratayā samāna uktaḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:431: sa kathaṃ nām gamyeta iti nyāyyo ṇiṅnirdeśaḥ iti /

GSP28dhebta_u:432_1: parokṣārthety āder ekadeśasya śābdyaiva gatyā guṇabhūtārthavācakatvaṃ da[6b] 1rśayann
GSP28dhebta_u:434: kṛtam arthātmanas tenābhihitena ity āśaṅkyāha -- na hi [3.24] iti /

GSP28dhebta_u:438: kiṃ tad i2ty apekṣāyāṃ brāhmaṇītyuktau strītvāvagatāv api yathā na tatra strīpratyayas tadvat sarvatra draṣṭavyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:439: ā samantād upyate 'nena iti āvapanam [4.5] kim ity apekṣāyāṃ iyam [4.5] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:441: nanu parokṣārthapratipatter anumānāśrayatvāt yadi tad vyutpādyate tarhi śabdāder api tannimittatvāt tad api kiṃ na vyutpādyate ity āśaṅkyāha -- anena [4.7] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:445: kasmād evam uktaṃ bhavatīty āha -- anyasmāt [4.8] iti uktatrirūpaliṅgād anyasmāt tatpratipatter avyabhicāriṇyāḥ parokṣārthapratipatter ayogād aprayujyamānatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:446: asaty avadhāraṇe ayam a4rthaḥ kutastya ity āha -- avadhāraṇāt [4.10] niyamād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:450: uktād anyena prakāreṇānumānatve prāmāṇye sati iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:452: {p. 247} syād etat -- aliṅgajāpi parokṣārthapratipattir 5avybhicāriṇī bhaviṣyati tatkahaṃ śabdādīnāṃ saty api prāmāṇye tathātvam ity āśaṅkyāha -- tathāhi [4.13] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:460: tad eva lakṣaṇaṃ svabhāvo yasya tadbhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt [4.15] /

GSP28dhebta_u:466: na hi pakṣadharmataiva liṅgasya rūpaṃ yena tajjāyāḥ tathātvaṃ syādity āha -- anyatrāpi(topi) [4.15] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:469: [10] S' prater atra truṭitatvātyadi syā' iti pūritam asmābhiḥ /

GSP28dhebta_u:474: yady evam astu tatpratipattihetoḥ pakṣadharmatvam api /

GSP28dhebta_u:485: yatra tu arthaviśeṣe vartate sa prāyeṇa kathyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:486: syād etat -- utsūtro 'yam arthas tvayā vyākhyāyate na tv ayam atrācāryasya vivakṣita ity āha eṣa ca [4.19] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:488: nanu prakṛtasambandhād arthitam ayam artho 'tyanta (-darśane 'yam artho 'saṅgata)
GSP28dhebta_u:490: vyāpta eva ca [4.22] iti samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇam idam /
GSP28dhebta_u:491: narañ ca nārāyaṇa[7a] 1m eva cādau svataḥ sutau dvau janayāṃ babhūva
GSP28dhebta_u:494: iti ca bhāvaḥ avadhāraṇāt [4.22] iti dhru(bru)vataḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:503: katham arthaviṣayatvābhidhāne 'numānaprāmāṇyasya svalakṣaṇa2viṣayatvam uktaṃ bhavatīty āha -- arthe[4.25]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:504: evam evācāryasya tathābhidhānaṃ saṅgacchate nānyatheti darśayitum āha -- ata eva [4.26] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:508: atra prāmāṇyasya vastuviṣayatvād anyena sāmānyaviṣayatvaprakāreṇa tatra [4.27] svalakṣaṇe,
GSP28dhebta_u:512: tena tadarthakriyārthitayaive pravṛttir upapatsyata ity āha -- sāmānyasyeti [5.1] /
GSP28dhebta_u:514: tasyām evārthakriyāyāṃ pravṛttir bhaviṣyatīty āha -- tasyāś ca [5.2] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:519: tarhi vāhadohārthakri4yārthitayaiva pratīte gotve sāmānye pravartsyatīti ata āha -- na hi [5.2] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:530: abhyupetyāpi sambandham idānīm āha -- satyapi [5.5] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:532: dhūmārthinopi dhūmapratipattau dhūmadhvaje pratipattiḥ prāpnoti iti iṣṭam dharmam atikrāntaḥ prasaṅgaḥ atiprasaṅga[5.6]s tasmāddhetoḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:534: vivekaḥ -- anyatvaṃ yena sa tathā tasya [5.6] /
GSP28dhebta_u:535: tadanavasāya eva kuta ity āha -- samavāyasya [5.3] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:542: nanu kim idaṃ samavāyasya sūkṣmatvaṃ vivakṣitam? /
GSP28dhebta_u:545: athāpy upalabdhijananayogyarūparahitatvaṃ tad api tadabhāvāt tad eva nopalabhyatām,
GSP28dhebta_u:546: na tu tasya tādrūpyeṇa sāmānyatadvetor bhedānupalakṣaṇam upapadyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:547: na ca samavāyo nopalabhyatenaiyāyikamate samavetaviśeṣaṇabhāvena tasyopalabdher iṣṭatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:550: iha hi sūkṣmatvaṃ samavāyasya samavāyinor bhedenānupalambhakatvaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:551: eṣa hi samavāyasya mahimā yena samavāyinau nirluṭhitagarbhavadbhedena nopala8mbhayati paṭatantvādivad iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:554: iha bhrāntes tvayāpy avaśyābhyupagantavyatvād bhrāntimātram evāstu [5.8] ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:555_0: vāsanādvayanibaddho hi vikalpaḥ svābhāsam evāgovyāvṛttaṃ pratiyan bāhyasyāpy agovyāvṛttatayā
GSP28dhebta_u:555_1: bhedam avagāhitum anīśāno bāhya eva gaur mayā pratīta ity abhimanyamā[7b] 1naḥ prakṛtyaiva
GSP28dhebta_u:556_0: bhrāntir eva bhrāntimātram [5.8] vastubhūtasāmānyaśūnyaṃ svakṣaṇāśrayatayā anumānajñānāśrayatayopagatatvena
GSP28dhebta_u:556_2: gaḍurūpaṃ [5.8] tena tadviṣayatayopagateneti prakaraṇāt kiṃ [5.8] na kiñcid ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:557: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- 2yadi vikalpo dṛśyavikalpyāv arthāv ekīkṛtya lokaṃ pravartayituṃ na śaknuyāt yadi ca tadupagame 'pi bhrāntiḥ pravṛttinimittaṃ nopagamyeta,
GSP28dhebta_u:559: yadi ca tat pramāṇaprasiddhaṃ bhavet gaḍuvadevānupayuktam api upagamyeta,
GSP28dhebta_u:563: na ca vyaktiṣu sarvato vyāvṛttāsu anugatākārasya buddhipratibhāsasyārope kiṇcin nimittam asti /
GSP28dhebta_u:564: tat kathaṃ bhrāntyā pravṛttikalpanā jyāyasīty abhiprāyavānāha -- nirbīje[5.8]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:566: yāḥ svahetubhyas tathotpannās tā vyaktayaḥ svahetusāmarthyāt tadekapratyavamarṣārthajñānādy ekaṃ kāryaṃ 4yāsāṃ tās tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:567: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- atatkāryavyāvṛttyā tadekakāryatvaṃ sarvasajātīyānugataṃ tāsu vidyamānam anugatākārasya buddhipratibhāsasyāropabījaṃ kin na bhavatīti? /
GSP28dhebta_u:568: syād etat -- tadekakāryatayā tathābhūtā api vyaktayaḥ tathābhūtāyā bhrānter bījam upapadyante /
GSP28dhebta_u:569: sāmānyam ity asmatpakṣasyāpi na kiñcit pramāṇam ity abhi5sambandham ākalayya parasparasāmānyābhidhānam unmūlayitum āha -- varṇe[5.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:572: tābhyāṃ samāno 'viśiṣṭaḥ ākāra ābhāso yasya yatra vā tat tathoktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:573: varṇasamānābhāsam ākṛtisamānābhāsaṃ varṇābhāsam ākṛtyābhāsam iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:575: tajjñānasyāpi tathātvaṃ nāyuktam ity āha -- na ca [5.11] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:579: varṇākṛtiprayuktaṃ hi pratibhāsamānaṃ hi tadvarṇākṛtiyoginy aparatra bhrānter bījaṃ [5.11] nibandhanaṃ bhavet,
GSP28dhebta_u:581: yadi nāma sāmānya7tadvator varṇādiyogābhyāṃ vaisadṛśyaṃ tathāpi sāmānyaṃ tatra bhramanibandhanaṃ kiṃ na bhavati ity āha -- sādṛśye[5.11]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:582: asti hi kācidbhrāntir yā antarupaplavasambhave ity abhipretya paraiḥ [5.12] ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:583: yadi evaṃ bāhyasya buddhipratibhāsena sāmānyena kiṃ sādṛśyaṃ yena brāntir utpadyata iti āha -- vyaktaya [5.12] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:584: [17]sāmānyālambanaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tasya ya ākāro8 vijātīyavyāvṛttarūpaṃ tasya sarūpāḥ [5.13][18]vijātīyavyāvṛttā [5.12] iti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇam /
GSP28dhebta_u:586: buddhipratibhāsasya vā atadrūpaparāvṛttatayaivāvabhāsanād iti ca bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:593_0: yairvaiśeṣikādibhir vyakter bhinnaṃ sāmānyam iṣṭaṃ tair apy avaśyam uktayā nītyā
GSP28dhebta_u:593_1: svalakṣaṇaviṣayam anumānasya prāmāṇyam eṣṭavyam iti pra[8a] 1tipādya saṃpratimīmāṃsakādīn
GSP28dhebta_u:596: tac ca vyaktisvarūpam iti svalakṣaṇaviṣayam eva prāmāṇyaṃ tasyāpatitam ity āśayaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:597: yady evaṃ bhavanmatavat tad api matam atiśobhanam ity āśaṅkya āha -- svalakṣaṇe[5.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:599: pratītau cakṣurindriyādivaiyarthyaprasaṅgena vyakter apratibhāsane tadātmakaṃ sāmānyaṃ katham iva pratibhāyād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:600: nanu yady anumānasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ tarhi pratyakṣād asya bhedaḥ katham ity āśaṅkyāha --[19]parokṣa iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:603: [19] S saṃjñakahetubinduṭīkāyāḥ prater atra truṭitatvāt mūlapāṭhābhāvaḥ bodhyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:605: yasmād arthā[t]sākṣād anudaya3mānam utpattuṃ liṅgam apeksate,
GSP28dhebta_u:606: arthañ ca na sākṣātkaroti tasmād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:608: syān matam -- yady asyāpi svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:610: so 'numānasya viṣayaḥ[NB I] itinyāyabindur virudhyetety āha -- tadeveti /
GSP28dhebta_u:612: kathaṃ tathā vaktuṃ śakyata ity āha -- lakṣyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:613: sā4mānyam atadrūpaparāvṛttir lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣakaṃ yasyātadrūpaparāvṛttasya vastunaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:614: ta eva bhedāś ca avivecitabhedāḥ sāmānyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:615: punar uktāśaṅkām ity arthapunaruktāśaṅkā ity avaseyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:618: arthapunaruktam -- yadā viśeṣavidhitsā5dyabhāve sa evārthaḥ śabdāntareṇābhidhīyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:619: śabdapunaruktaṃ tu vidhitsādyabhāva eva yadā sa eva śabdaḥ punar uccāryate /
GSP28dhebta_u:620: viśeṣavidhitsādibhāve tad eva dvaidham arthānuvādaśabdānuvādātmanā dvaidhaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:626: prabhedo 'pi dvidhā draṣṭavyaḥ -- anupalabdhyādibhedena pakṣadharmatvādyātmanā ca /
GSP28dhebta_u:629: rūpaprabhedaniścāyakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nokta7m evaty āśaṃkyāha trividheti /
GSP28dhebta_u:632: evam abhidhānād eva cāsya prabhedasyety atrāsmābhis tathā vyākhyātam anyathā etan na saṃgaccheta /
GSP28dhebta_u:633: syād etat -- liṅgalakṣaṇānumānasvarūpasya vyutpādanaṃ syād yadi lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tan nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavet /
GSP28dhebta_u:634: prabhedasya ca 8tadā syād yadi tan nirdeśaḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:635: na cātra tadvācakam astīty āha tatra tredhāvyutpādane vyavasthite satīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:636: evañ ca nirdeśapradarśanaṃ paraṃ kṛtaṃ boddhavyaṃ na tu lakṣaṇānuvādena lakṣyavidhirdarśitaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:637: hetur iti tu lakṣyamanūdya pakṣadharma ityādilakṣaṇaṃ vidheyam avaseyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:642: atra tu sāhāyakaṃkumārilasākṣiṇam apakṣipann āha tad uktam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:653: so 'pi kasmād ity āha -- yogyatvād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:656: sa viṣayo 'syeti tadviṣayas tasya bhāvas tattā /
GSP28dhebta_u:661: [20] bhāvāṃśenaiva saṃyogo yogyatvādi indriyasya hi' iti SV, abhāva 18 /
GSP28dhebta_u:664: anukrāntaṃ rūpaṃ [6.9] svabhāvo yasya tat tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:666: hetvantaram api tathā bhaviṣyati ity āha -- yadi [6.9] iti sambhāvayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:674: na ca tasya cātyantāsato 'vikalakāraṇasya bhāvaḥ sambhavati iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:679: {p. 253} amūṣāṃ sambhavam abhyupapadyedānīṃ dūṣaṇaṃ datte -- sambhave ca[23] [6.14] 5iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:683: nanu katham ayaṃ niyamaḥ sidhyatīti praśne kim idam akṛtaṃ niyamasiddhyanaṅgam abhidhīyata ity āśaṅkyāha -- evaṃ manyata [6.18] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:687: tadvipakṣasya [6.19] tasya niyamaviṣayasya vipakṣaḥ tadvipakṣas tasya vyāptau /
GSP28dhebta_u:689: 6pratiṣedhyasya hetutvasya yaḥ svabhāvas tena yadviruddhaṃ hetvābhāsatvaṃ tasya upalabdhyā [6.25] /
GSP28dhebta_u:692: kathaṃ punaḥ parasparaparihāravattayā tayor virodhaḥ pratīyata ity āha -- tadātme[7.1]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:693: tasya hetor ya ātmā tatra niyato yaḥ pratibhāsas tasya yaj jñānaṃ saṃve7danaṃ tasmāddhetoḥ viparītasya anyatayā tadanātmatayā sāmarthyāt jñātayā /
GSP28dhebta_u:696: tasmāt kiṃ bhavatīty āha -- parasparam iti [7.2]
GSP28dhebta_u:697: syād etat -- atyantāsato hetvantarasya na kenacit saha virodhāvagatiḥ yena viruddhopalambhāt abhāvagatir bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:698: tatra ca hetutvam a8tyantāsat kathaṃ niṣidhyeta iti pūrvapakṣadvayam utprekṣamāṇa āha -- te ca [7.4] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:700: nāpi ca tena niṣidhyamānaṃ hetutvam atyantāsattayopagatam iti sambandhanīyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:701: tarhi kim atra tattvam ity āha -- kevalaṃ [7.6] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:702: anyatra [7.6] kāryādau prasiddhaṃ niścitaṃ vyāmohād ajñānāt tatra [7.6] hetutrayabāhye arthe āropitaṃ [7.7] sattvena vyavasthāpitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:704: tat [7.7] tasmāt / kiṃ kasmāt sāmarthyāt prakāśyamānam ity uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:705: evam upalakṣaṇatvād asya kathaṃ niṣedha ity api draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:706: nanu kiṃ hetvantare hetutvaṃ bhavatvā[bhavat hetvā]bhāsatvabhāvān nivartamānam avagataṃ yena tasyānena virodho vakṣyata ity āha -- na ca [7.8] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:707: idānīm atyantāsattvam abhyupagamyāpi doṣābhāvaṃ pradarśayitum āha -- nāpi [7.10] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:708: {p. 254} kathaṃ punas tatraiva2 tadavagamo na bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha -- na hi [7.11] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:710: satas tadavagama ity āha -- sarvatra[24] [7.13] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:713: ālokānurodhena sa tu “virodho 'pi tu sarvatra” iti gamyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:717: niyatarūpapratītir eva sarveṇa samaṃ tasya virodhapratītir iti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:722: prakaraṇaṃ nigamayann āha -- iti sthitam e3tat [7.18] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:725: pramāṇayor dvaitāt dvayor aniyatarūpadarśane katareṇe[7.25]ty uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:727: viśeṣapratiṣedhāt śeṣavidhānaṃ labdham ity abhiprāyeṇa pakṣadharmatāsadbhāve
GSP28dhebta_u:729: bhavatu avinābhāvābhāvo hetvābhāsatvan tu kasmād ity āha -- avinābhāveti [8.2] /
GSP28dhebta_u:731: saṃprati viśiṣṭena nāmnā sādhanam idam avacchindan āha -- iti [8.3] ityādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:732: avinābhāvavaikalyam eva tu kutaḥ siddhim ity āha -- avinābhāvavaikalyañ ca [8.5] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:733: tebhyaḥ5 svabhāvādibhyo vyatiriktānāṃ vyāpakānupalabdhyā[26] [8.6] vakṣyamāṇasya vyāpakasyānupalabdhyā /
GSP28dhebta_u:737: tadanupalabdhir eva kuta ity āha -- trividhe[8.5]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:738: tadbhāve hi trividhāntarbhāvād eva tadvyatiriktatvam eva na bhaved iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:739: kiṃ tadvyāpakānupalabdhyā tatsiddhim adhyārohatīty āha -- tathāhi [8.6] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:743: tasmād utpattis tatkāraṇād votpattiś ca tadutpattir iṣṭā draṣṭavyā /
GSP28dhebta_u:744: kutas tābhyāṃ tasya vyāptir ity āha -- tayoḥ [8.7] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:749: kiṃ punar anyathāpi na bhāvah ity āha -- atatsvabhāvasyeti [8.8] /
GSP28dhebta_u:750: pūrvoktata7dutpattiniṣedhena yasya yasmād anutpattir yatkāraṇād vā tasyātadutpatter iti [8.8] boddhavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:752: syād etat -- dṛṣṭacaram idaṃ yat atatsvabhāvena anutpannena ca kenacit kasyacid avyabhicāro yathā rasādinā rūpāder ity āha -- rūpādinā [8.15] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:756: tatkāraṇotpattir eva [8.16] ity abhidadhānas tadutpattiśabdena pūrvaṃ dve vidhe vivakṣite iti sphuṭayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:759: ekārthasamavāyitvam eva viśeṣa ity abhipretur vacanam ekārtha [8.19] ityādinā śaṅkate /
GSP28dhebta_u:760: ekārthasamavāya ity atra dvayī vyutpa[9b] 1ttiḥ -- ekasminn arthe ekasmin samavāya ekārthasya vā samavāya iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:761: atra tu ekasminn arthe dvayoḥ samavāyaḥ iti vivakṣitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:762: sa nimittaṃ yasya avinābhāvasya sa tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:764: “ayutasiddhānām ādhāryādhārabhūtānāṃ yaḥ sambandha ihapratyayahetuḥ sa samavāyaḥ” [Praśasta. p. 696)
GSP28dhebta_u:766: astu tathāvidhayor asau kā kṣatir iti āha -- sa ca [8.20] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:769: sthityādikaraṇenādhārabhāvasyānyatra niṣiddhatvād iti bhāvaḥ / itiḥ [8.21] hetau /
GSP28dhebta_u:771: tad eva tu nāstīti saṃprati pratipādayann āha --[27]yathā ca [8.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:772: tādā3tmye ce[28][9.1]ti tena sahety eva yojanīyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:774: [27] S prater atra truṭitatvāt “-samavāyo[vase]yaḥ” iti kalpanayā pūritaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:779: {p. 256} ye [9.2] vastusvabhāvāḥ evaṃ bhavanti [9.2] tathābhūtāvyabhicāriṇo bhavanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:780: bhavantas tarhi kiṃ kartāra ity āha -- kevalam [9.3] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:783: itiḥ [9.4] tasmāt na kasya cidva4stunaḥ sa svabhāvo viramet /
GSP28dhebta_u:784: sarvasya sarvaḥ svabhāvaḥ syād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:785: digādivad ahetoḥ sato deśakālaniyamo neṣṭa eveti vādini tu deśakālagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:786: tena yathā deśakālaniyamo heturahitasya nāsti tathā dravyaniyamo 'pi na syād ityarthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:788: 5hir yasmāt tadgamakaṃ vastu kartṛ kiñcid gamyaṃ[29]kañcid(kvacid)
GSP28dhebta_u:789: dharmiṇyupanīyeta agnir vā na veti [9.5] tadviparītaṃ vā syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:790: yasya [9.5] vastuno yatra [9.6] gamye kiñcid dravyam āyattaṃ,
GSP28dhebta_u:791: na veti asya vivaraṇaṃ anāyattam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:803: na tu bhavadabhipretam ity āha tac ca [9.10] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:806: etad evācāryavacanena saṃsyandayann āha -- tathā cāha [9.11] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:807: syād etat -- asaty api tatsvābhāvye tatkāryatve vā kiñcid arthāntaram avyabhicaradṛṣṭam eva yathā 7tape tarucchāyā /
GSP28dhebta_u:809: evam ādyasmābhirdharmottarapradīpe vistareṇa nirūpitam ity āstām tāvad iha /
GSP28dhebta_u:810_0: syād etad -- avinābhāvasya tādātmyatadutpattyor avyabhicāre nimittam na tāvat tādātmyatadutpattī
GSP28dhebta_u:810_1: sto yathā cāyaṃ tathā tadanyopi tadavyabhicārī ca syā8n na ca tasya tatsvabhāvatvaṃ tatkāryatvañ ceti /
GSP28dhebta_u:813: kevalaṃ kayācid vyapekṣayā tato bhinna iva kathyate. na tu tāvatā vastuto bhinna eva. avinābhāvi ca rūpaṃ kiñcid avyabhicaritavyād arthāntaraṃ kiñcid anarthāntaram,
GSP28dhebta_u:816: tadabhāvaṃ tu tad api rūpaṃ nāstīti pratipādyata iti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28dhebta_u:817: atra [9.15] asminn arthe prayogo [9.15] dvyavayaṃ sādhanavākyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:819: syād etat -- yathā tādātmyatadutpattyabhāvo 'py anupalabdhiḥ sādhyāvyabhicāriṇī tathānyad api kiṃ na bhaved ity āśaṃ2kyāha svabhāve[9.18]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:821: tādātmyaṃ [9.19] lakṣanaṃ nibandhanaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:822: tad apiācāryasyābhimatam iti darśayann āha taduktam [9.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:823: idānīm imam eva “pakṣadharma“ityādiślokaṃ anyathā vyācikhyāsuranena yāvanto 'rthā nirdiṣṭāḥ tāvataḥ parisaṃkhyātum āha -- tad evam [9.25] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:829: etac chlokavyākhyānasyāparām api vidhāṃ darśayann āha -- athavā [9.28] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:831: na tv avadhāraṇacintākṛteti tato bhinnam idaṃ vyākhyānam /
GSP28dhebta_u:832: katham idam uktam avadhāraṇam upapadyata ity abhipretya pṛcchati /
GSP28dhebta_u:835: avi4nābhāva[32]bhāvād iti śliṣṭanirdeśam abhisandhāya trividhasya ca [10.3] ity uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:836: tathā hy avinābhāve niyamān niyatatvād ity ukte kasyety āśaṃkāyāṃ trividhasya ca śrutatvāt trividhasyeti yujyate vaktum /
GSP28dhebta_u:841: vyākhyātena korthātiśayaḥ prakāśito bhavatīty āha tena [10.3] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:844: tataḥ [10.7] kāraṇāt trividhahetuvāhyeṣu hetuvyavahāraṃ kurvanto nirastā bhavanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:846: trivedhe ca hetāv ahetutām ācakṣāṇā nirastā bhavanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:853: {p. 258} asmin vyākhyāne “hetvābhāsās tato 'pare” iti vyākhyātuṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ racayann āha[35]tathaitat [10.11] 6iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:854: dvedhā hi tadaṃśavyāptiviraho viparyayavyāpteḥ viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvād ity abhiprāyeṇāha viparyaye[10.17]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:855: te [10.17] buddhiniviṣṭā asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikā heturūpavikalatayā hetvābhāsā gamyanta eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:857: na tu tatsaṃjñayā jñātais taiḥ prayojana(naṃ)
GSP28dhebta_u:859: evam api vā prajñāiḥ jñāyanta iti na kācit kṣatiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:863: evadeva sāmānyanyāyopadarśanamukhena prasādhayann āha -- tathāhi [10.19] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:864: atrāpi vyākhyāne aṅgāṅgibhāvena pratipāditānām arthānām avacchedaṃ kurvann āha -- tad atreti [10.27] /
GSP28dhebta_u:866: trividha eva hetur ity asyāvadhāraṇadvayasya kāraṇam [11.1] upapattī dve 8ity arthatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:869: anantaroktās trayo 'rthā imau ca dvikāraṇalakṣaṇau dvāv arthāpattayaś caka iti ṣaḍarthā bhavanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:870: asminn eva śloke pūrvavyākhyānāparityāgenāvṛttyaivāparam api vyākhyānam abhyuccinvann āha kiñceti [11.4] /
GSP28dhebta_u:872: sa[10b] 1iti prabhedasya vyutpādanam” iti bruvatā sa hetus traidhā kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhibhedabhinna iti prakāśitam evaitat,
GSP28dhebta_u:875: kevalaṃ “tridhaiva sa” ity atra vyākhyānāntaram idaṃ vidheyaṃ tac ca tadā sujñātaṃ bhavati,
GSP28dhebta_u:876: yady asya prākpravṛttaṃ vyākhyānam upadarśya pradarśyata ity abhiprāyeṇa tad vyākhyānam anūditam /
GSP28dhebta_u:877: etad apekṣeṇa tu a2thavety anena kiñcaśabdārtham ujjvalayatā yat pradarśyate tad eva vyākhyānāntaraṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:879: tenāyam arthaḥ -- kāryādibhedabhinna eva pratyekaṃ pakṣadharmatvānvayavyatirekātmakas trirūpa eveti /
GSP28dhebta_u:880: etenaikadvipadaparyudāsena ṣaṭpakṣān pratikṣipya saptamapakṣaparigraheṇānumānalakṣaṇam abhipre3taṃ vārtikakṛto darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:885: tathāhi pakṣadharmo hetur ity ucyamāne yasya sapakṣenanvayo vipakṣe ca pravṛttiḥ sopi hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:887: sapakṣe yasyānvaya ity ucyamā4ne vipakṣapravṛtter apakṣadharmasya hetutvaṃ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:888: yathā nityaḥ śabdaś cākṣuṣatvāt sāmānya{p. 259}vad iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:889: ya(ta)thā sapakṣavyatireka ity ucyamāne yo 'pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe ca nāsti sa hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:891: pakṣadharme sapakṣe ca yo 'sti sa hetur ity ucyamāne nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvād iti5 vipakṣavṛttir hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:892: pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe nāstīty ucyamāne nityaḥ śabdo jātimattve sati śrāvaṇatvād ity ayaṃ sapakṣavṛttihīno hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:893: sapakṣe 'sti vipakṣe ca nāstīty ucyamāne anityāḥ paramānavaḥ kṛtakatvād ity ayam apakṣadharmo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:894: tad etat sarvam mā bhūd iti samudāyopādāne prayo6janam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:895: idam eva ca sarvaṃ buddhāvādhāyadharmottarapradīpe 'smābhir abhyadhāyi “trirūpāl liṅgād iti ca ācakṣāṇena” ityādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:897: anvayavyatirekātmakayos tu rūpayoḥ kenābhidhānaṃ yenaivaṃ vyākhyāyata ity āha tadaṃśe[11.6]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:902: vastūnāñ ca viruddhasvabhāvadvayābhāvāt tatraikasmiṃs tadavinābhāvini tadviruddharūpāvinābhāvino 'nyasyāsaṃbhavenāpi(pya)
GSP28dhebta_u:904: yasya tu tadvya8tiriktam iṣṭaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇa vyatirikta[11.10]grahaṇam /
GSP28dhebta_u:908: rūpāntarayoginy apy avinābhāvāsambhavād asiddhas tadbhāva ity āha tadvati [11.14] pratibandhanibandhanā[vinā] bhāvavatīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:909: yadi tasminn api rūpāntaraṃ syāt kevalam apramāṇakam etad ucyata ity āha yathā ce[11.15]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:915: tathābhūtasamudāyasādhakapramāṇābhāvena taddharmatayā sarvasyaiva grahītum aśakyatvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:916: atha kathañcit taddharmasya siddhiḥ [11.19] niścayas tasyāṃ vā siddhaprayojanatvāt tasya hetor vaiyarthyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:917: parasthānapatitatvāt para evāsāv ity abhiprāyeṇaīśvarasena eva paraḥ [12.6] abhipretaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:920: tatra cirāspadībhūte dharmiṇi dvayor apy anyayor asiddhatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:921: idam iha svarūpāsiddham idaṃ tu vyadhikaraṇāsiddham ity etad eva kuto vyavasthāpyam iti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:925: {p. 260} kasmāt tatsaṃbandhanā3rthaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam ity āśaṃkāyāṃ tad abhidhānīyaṃ tadabhivyaktatvād anena noktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:926: dharmo hetus tadaṃśena vyāpta ityukte vā [saka]lopi hi jānāty eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:930: paksasya dharmiṇo dharmasyānupapatteḥ na tāvat karmadhārayo ta evāsaṃkhyāpūrvakatvā4c ca na dviguḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:933: na hi sa eva dharmī sa eva dharma ity arthavirodhāc ca samāsāntasyānicpratyayaprasakteś ca na bahuvrīhiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:934: napusaṃkaliṅgāt dvivacanaprasaṅgāc ca “cā“arthāsaṃbhavāc ca na dvandvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:935: saptamīsamāsasūtre ca dharmaśabdasyāsaṃgrahād yogavibhāgena tatsamāsabhāve5pi ṣaṣṭhīsaptamyor abhedād ity abhiprāyavān prāha [37]ṣaṣthītatpuruṣād [14.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:936: ṣaṣṭhīsamāse ca rājapuruṣādau svāmyantaravyavacchedo dṛṣṭo rājñaḥ puruṣo vācyusyeti(-ṣo nānyasyeti) /
GSP28dhebta_u:937: tadvad ihāpi pakṣasya dharmo nānyasyety anyayogavyavacchedaḥ syād ity abhisambandhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:942: ādiśabdād buddhyādi kṣaṇikatveneṣṭam iti tat ka6tham aksaṇivādinaṃ taṃ prati pakṣasya(syā)
GSP28dhebta_u:944: na pratyakṣataḥ [15.22] iti bruvatoyaṃ bhāvaḥ -- yadi pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇasyopalakṣaṇaṃ syāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:946: yadā tv anumānatas tadā tad api teṣām anumānam adṛṣṭāntakaṃ kathaṃ syād iti sādhanaṃ duḥkham iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:947: etac ca kasyacit parasya kṣaṇikatvābhyu7pagamam abhyupagamyoktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:948: na tu sahetunāśavādibhir buddhyāder apy utpattikṣaṇa eva bhāvo na tu dvitīye kṣaṇa iti evaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇikatvam eṣṭavyam,
GSP28dhebta_u:949: āśutaravināśitvābhiprāyeṇa kṣaṇikaśabdapravṛtter iṣṭatvād iti draṣṭavyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:950: tatra prati.....ndhanasyāvinābhāvasya bādhakapramāṇataḥ siddhāv apy anyatve 'traiva vṛttir apekṣaṇīyeti paribhā.... 8kālpanikatvaṃ [15.24] tasya pratipannaṃ syād ity āśayaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:954_0: yad vastu dhūmādikaṃ kvacit parvatādau dṛṣṭaṃ niścitaṃ tasya dhūmādeḥ yatra vahnyādau
GSP28dhebta_u:954_1: pratibandhaḥ pratibaddhatvam tadvidaḥ pratibandhavidaḥ puṃsas tasya pratibandhaviṣayasya
GSP28dhebta_u:954_2: vahnyādeḥ tad dhūmādi[11b] 1kaṃ gamakam anumāpakaṃ tatra parvatādau itiḥ evam arthe /
GSP28dhebta_u:956: evaṃparam [16.5] evaṃpradhānam etad arthaṃ “tattulye sadbhāvaḥ” iti vacanam /
GSP28dhebta_u:958: dharmo yasya sa taddharmā [16.5] sādhyadharmī tasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:960: {p. 261} pakṣatvena tasya sapakṣatvaṃ nirākriyata ity āha sādhyatvene[16.6]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:963: kasmāt tannibandhanaṃ tad ity apekṣāyām āha -- anyathā [16.8] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:968: yadāpi tathāvidhasya hetor anyatve ca prasiddhena 3pratibandhen kāryaṃ tadāpy anyatrāpy ananuvartamānaḥ kathaṃ duṣyed ity āha tadā hī[16.18]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:969: viruddhopi viparyaye samyagdhetuneti ceti viparyayāniścitavṛttitvam uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:973: tat katham asau tatra saṃśayahe4tuḥ syād ity āśaṃkyāha -- tadubhayabahir bhāvāyogāt [16.19] sādhyavṛttivyavacchede vahnibhāvāyogāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:974: kasyety āśaṃkāyām āha taddharmiṇaḥ [16.19] tasya hetor āśrayasyeti /
GSP28dhebta_u:978: anyonyavyavacchedarūpāṇām ekabhāvasyā5paravidhināntarīyatvāt kutaḥ prakārāntaraṃ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:979_0: syād etat -- antarvyāptiprasādhakād eva pramāṇādvivādādhyāsitasya dharmiṇas taddharmatvajñānān
GSP28dhebta_u:979_1: maulasya hetoh katham ativyaktam api vaiyarthyaṃbhadantadharmākaradattena na lakṣitam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:981: evaṃ hi bruvato 'syāyam āśa6yaḥ -- dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇīva sādhyadharmiṇy api sarvopasaṃhāreṇa dharmānavacchedena vyāptigrahe maulād eva sādhyasiddheḥ kuto vaiyarthyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:982: itarathā dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyapi viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ katham iva maulo hetur vaiyarthyaṃ nāśnuvīta /
GSP28dhebta_u:983: tathāhi tatrāpi tatpravṛttaṃ dharmisāmānyopagraheṇa vyāptiṃ pratipadyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:984: 7tathā ca pakṣīkṛtasyāpi jijñāsitadharmavattvaṃ tata eva siddham iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:985_0: athocyate -- bādhakapramāṇamāhātmyāt sattvasya kṣaṇikatvasiddhāv api kiṃ na śaśaviṣāṇādes
GSP28dhebta_u:986: itaḥ sattvahetor evāsaṃhṛtāt śabdādeḥ kṣaṇikatvāvagatir nāsmanmate hetor vaiyarthyam i8ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:988: tathāhi vyāptigrāhakāt pramāṇāt tatra pravṛttād api dharmiviśeṣāparigraheṇa plavamānākārā pravṛttiḥ kṣaṇikatvasattvayos tādātmyagrāhiṇī jātā na tu pravṛttyaṅgam /
GSP28dhebta_u:989: “ya(sa)ccedam” iti tu darṣite sati “idaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ śabdādi” iti pravṛttyaṅgaṃ pratītir upajāyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:991: katham asmanmate maula[12a] 1sya hetor vaiyarthyam {p. 262}amandamandākṣeṇocyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:992: dharmottarādibhirvigarhite 'py asminmate gatir iyaṃ asmābhir upavarṇitā /
GSP28dhebta_u:993: atrāpi tu kiñcid vācyaṃ tad asmābhir evasvayūthyavicāre darśitam iha tu mā bhūd virasībhāva iti nocyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:996: atra ca pakṣa eva 2vyavacchedakavad viśeṣaṇam iti tenaiva sahāvadhāraṇaṃ vācyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:997: tathā ca pakṣasyaive dharma ity uktau tadavastho doṣa iti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:999: “viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyābhyām” ity atra śābdīṃ gatim anāśrityāśritatvād viśeṣaṇam,
GSP28dhebta_u:1000: āśrayatvād viśeṣyam ity ārthena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor abhipretatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1003: dharmas tv āśri3tatvād viśeṣaṇam eva na viśeṣya iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1004: tena sahoditanipāto 'yogam eva vyavacchinattīti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1009: prakṛṣṭe ananyasādhāraṇe guṇe 'tiśaye vṛttir yasya sa [17.12] tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1010: tad uktaṃ “4na hi viśeṣasannidhir eva sāmānyaśabdānāṃ viśeṣāvasthitihetur api tu prakaraṇasāmarthyādikam arpaya(m api” i)ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1019: na tu yathā mudritaḥ “prakaraṇa sāmarthyādinā” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1021: kamāt tatra dhanurdharatvamātram ity āha pratipādye[17.15]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1029: kiṃ dhūmādīnāṃ āśritatvena dharmāṇāṃ dhūmatvapārthivatvādayo dharmā na santi6?
GSP28dhebta_u:1031: satyam etad vā kevalaṃ bodhe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1032: dharmaśabdeneha sādhyo vahnyādir abhipretaḥ sa ca tasya dharmo nāsty eveti kim avadyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1033: athātra kena dharmo 'bhihito yena dharmasya dharmabhāvapratipādanaṃ yujyata ity āha {p. 263} aṃśaś ca [17.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1035: aṃśa ivāṃśo yathāṃśo '7śiviśeṣaṇas tathā dharmopi dharmiviśeṣaka ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1036: pakṣaśabdena samudāyavacanāt tad ekadeśa evāṃśo vaktavya ity āha pakṣaśabdena [17.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1037: tasyaivaikadeśaḥ kiṃ nocyata ity āha tasya[40]ca [17.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1038: [40] mudrite “ca” rahitaḥ pāṭhaḥ kaplitaḥ kintu ālokasammataḥ pāṭhaḥ “tasya ca eka-” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1041: yato vyāpye sati vyāpakasya niyamenopasthāpanam eva vyāpakaniṣṭhā vyāpti8s tatkaraṇāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1042: vyāpyasyaiva [18.3] na tu vyāpakasya vyāptatāpratītir avinābhāvitāpratītiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1043: kim apekṣā sā tathā pratītir ity āha[42]vyāpake[18.2]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1044: vyāpakabhāvam apekṣate “īkṣikṣamibhyāṃñ ca” [Vā. 1981] iti karmopapade ṇaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1045: vyāpakasya bhāvaṃ niyamaviṣayaṃ rūpam apekṣya paryālocya tathā pratītir bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1047: [41] ayam eva samyak pāṭhaḥ na tu yathā kalpito 'smābhih “dharmāṇāṃ dharmāntaratvābhāvāt” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1051: tatra bhāvam evety abhimatam avadhāraṇaṃ pradarśyānabhimataṃ nirā[12b] 1kurvann āha na tv i[18.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1057: tatraive[18.8]ty avadhāraṇam abhimataṃ pratipādyānyathāvadhāraṇaṃ niṣedhayann āha atrāpīti [18.9] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1058: etad eva sūtrakāravacanena saṃsyandayann āha tad uktami[18.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1059: 2liṅge sādhane sati liṅgī sādhyaṃ bhavaty eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:1061: itaralliṅgaṃ punarliṅginy eva sādhya eva bhavatīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1063: uktena prakāreṇa niyamasyāvadhāraṇasya viparyāse vaiparītye-viparyāsaś ca ekatrāyogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇā(ṇama)
GSP28dhebta_u:1067: ayañ ca doṣaācāryeṇaye dhūmaṃ saṃyoginaṃ hetum icchanti,
GSP28dhebta_u:1070: te hi dhūmā{p. 264}vayavinaṃ pradeśaṃ vā dharmiṇam ādhāya4 sāgnitvasiṣādhayiṣayā dhūmatvaṃ dhūmavattvaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ hetum upādadata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1076: etad api tadvacanena saṃsyandayann āha -- tathā ca [19.1] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1077: dviṣṭhatvāt sambandhasya katham ubhayatraikākāratāvyāptir na syād ity āśaṃkya yady api ity anena dviṣṭhaṃ samba5ndhaṃ vāstavam abhyupagamyāpi pratividhatte /
GSP28dhebta_u:1078: kayor asāv ity āha = aṅga [19.2] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1080: rasya grahaṇād aṃgyate liṅgyate pratīyate 'nena parokṣārtha ity aṅgaṃ liṅgam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1089: kayor iva sety āha -- ādhārādheyayor iveti saptamyantād vatiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1090_0: yathā ādhārādheyabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho dviṣṭhopi naikarūpayā vṛttyā dvayor vartate
GSP28dhebta_u:1090_1: yata evaikasambandhayogepi nādhārasyā7dheyatvam ādheyasya vādhāratvaṃ tathā liṅgaliṅginor
GSP28dhebta_u:1092: ata eva dhūmatvādir eva vyāpyatayā gamako na prameyatvādiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1093: vahnitvādir eva vyāpakatayā gamyo na tu tārṇatvādir nāpi dhūmo gamyo vahnir gamaka iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1094: yata evaṃ tasya vṛttiḥ tena [19.4] kāraṇena /
GSP28dhebta_u:1101: tasyāḥ sūcakaṃ prakāśanaṃ tad eva arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya “vā“śabdasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:1102: paramārthatas tādātmyāt [19.24] iti bruvatā tadupapādayatā cānvayena vyatirekagatau vyatirekeṇa cānvayagatau svabhāvahetur adhikṛta iti darśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1110: pratyakṣānumānābhyām iti sāmasty aniṣedho boddhavyo na tu kasyacit /
GSP28dhebta_u:1113: [44] atra S prater ekaṃ patraṃ naṣṭam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1115: avikalpanatvāt pratyakṣāsya kathaṃ tato niścayas tasya sambhavīty āśaṃkyāha -- pratyakṣeṇa[45]pratī[20.8]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1118: upacārata [20.9] iti pratyakṣato niścaya ity upacārataḥ ucyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1122: nanu sāmānyaṃ liṅgaṃ kathaṃ tasyādhyakṣato niścaya ity āha yady apī[20.11]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1127: sattve vā kiṃ tasya bhāgostīty āśaṃkyabauddhābhipretam eva darśayan para āha āloke[20.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1132: tarhy anumānotseda eva prāpta ity āśaṃkya puner eva vyavasthāṃ kurvann āha tasmād [20.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1133: kathaṃ punaḥ sa eva dharmī sa eva hetur bhavitum arhatīty āha sāgniḥ [20.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1134: anena dhūmaviśeṣasya dharmitvaṃ dhūmasāmānyasya hetutvaṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1138: tāvata [20.27] iti dṛśyādṛśyavibhāgavataḥ dhūmepi dharmiṇi uktena prakāreṇa etat saṃgacchata iti sāmyābhimānaśaṣyaṃ(śasyaṃ)
GSP28dhebta_u:1142: anyatropalabhyamānasyānyadeśāpekṣayā gamakatvaṃ katham ity āha deśa6kāle[21.2]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1143: ācāryeṇāpy etad abhimatam ity upadarśayann āha yadāce(he)[21.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1144: ataś caivam abhyupetavyam iti darśayann āha pathe[21.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1146: dharmiṇo vā[21.15] svarūpagrahaṇam api tāvat kathaṃ yujyate ity eva yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1149: {p. 266} evam asau pratyavatastha iti kathaṃ jñāyata ity āśaṃkyāha tena hī[21.16]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1152: yad āhaśabarasvāmī“ko dharmmo yaḥ śreyaḥsādhanaḥ” [Śābarabhā.1.1.2] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1159: kadā tatpūrvakaṃ tad ity āha yadeti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1163: vikalpanam antareṇāpi kathaṃ na tathā grahaṇam ity āha nace[21.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1167: pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇaṃ kasyety apekṣāyām āha liṅgāde[21.23]r iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1172: kiṃ vikalpamātrasya tathotpattir ity āśaṃkyāha -- arthe[21.24]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1175: nanu nirvikalpasavikalpabhedenārthavijñānasya dvaite satīdaṃ vaktuṃ yujyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:1178: vikalpāt pūrvaṃ bhāvāt prathamam [21.25] ādyam bālādiṣu tathā3vidhavikalpāniṣṭer jñānaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayeṣṭam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1182: jātyādibhir viśiṣṭaṃ yayā buddhyāvasīyate sāpi na kevalam ālocanājñānam iti apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1183: evaṃ ca bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ -- yady api prathamaṃ nirvikalpakabodhena dvyātmakaṃ 4vastugṛhītam indriyasaṃbandhāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:1190: yasmāt tenaivaṃ bruvatā sāmarthyād etat prakāśitaṃ tataḥ [22.3] tasmāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1191: tenakumārilena upada[46]rśito yo doṣaḥ “saugatānām eva pratyakṣeṇa liṅgādyagrahaṇām” ity evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:1196: {p. 267} śiṣyāṇāṃ sukhapratipattyarthaṃ sadhūmaṃ hī[22.4]tyādiphakkikāyāḥ samudāyārtham upadarśayann āha ayam atre[22.5]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1198: kartuṃ samarthaṃ tat6 kathaṃ tannibandhanas tanniścaya ity abhidhātari katham idaṃ “sadhūmaṃ hī“tyādivaco na plavata ity āśaṃkāyām atre[22.5]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1200: ekasya sākṣād itarasya sāmarthyāj jananāt vidhipratiṣedhavikalpadvayaṃ janayatī[22.9]ty uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1201: kadācid vidhivikalpaṃ kadācit pratiṣedhavikalpaṃ janayatīty abhiprāyeṇa caitad uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1206: yady anubhavānatikrameṇa vikalpodayas tadā sarvatrāṃśe tadudayaprasaṅgaḥ ity āha abhyāse[22.11]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1214: asyāpy ayam arthaḥ -- nānubhava ity eva vikalpaṃ janayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1215: kiṃtu kaścit punaḥ punas tatrotpadyamānas tādṛśo bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1217: kaścit tu svabhāvātiśayalakṣaṇaṃ pāṭavam apekṣya janayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1218: asyāpy aya[14a] 1m arthaḥ -- kaścid anubhavaḥ prakṛtyaiva paṭīyān jāyate yas tatra kṣamaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1221: kvacit punar avidyānubandhāt sadṛśāparāparotpādavipralabdhaś ca sarvadaiva tiraskṛtapaṭimā yo naiva tatkṣamo bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1227: syād etat -- sa2mbandho 'yam iti niścayānanubhavanāt kathaṃ sambandhaniścayas tannibandhana ucyata ity āśaṃkyāha tathāhī[22.13]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1229: nanu sambandhasyādhārādheyalakṣaṇasyānanubhavāt kathaṃ tanniścayas tannibandhana upavarṇyata ity āha na ce[22.16]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1230: tathā [22.19] auttarādharyeṇa avasthitam arthadvyam āśritya [22.19] gṛhītvā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1231: {p. 268} yadi 3tathābhūtavastudvayād anyo nāsti tarhi katham “anayor ayaṃ saṃbandhaḥ sambandhinau caitau” iti vyavahāra ity āha -- teneti[22.20] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1232: yena tathābhūtavastudvayānubhavāśrayataḥ samāropitaḥ sanbandhaḥ tena kāraṇena vyavahāra[22.21]ś ca “ayaṃ dharmī ayaṃ dharmaḥ” iti śābdo 'bhipretaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1235: na tv ayaṃ paramārthiko vyavahāra ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1237: tasya ca pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt sambandhaniścayas tathābhūtavastudvayakṛtos tu,
GSP28dhebta_u:1240: na ca viśeṣo liṅgam ity āśaṃkyāha sāmānye[22.22]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1242: syād etat -- anugatasya vastuno 'bhāve 'nugatapratyayo nirhetukaḥ kathaṃ bhaved ity āha teṣām eva [22.23] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1243: na svalakṣaṇasya vikalpajanane sākṣād vyāparas tasyātadviṣayatvād ity āha -- anubhave[22.23]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1244: yadi te vijātīyasvabhāvās tathāpi kathaṃ ta6tpratyayahetutvaṃ teṣām ity āha -- vijātīye[22.23]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1247: ācāryavacanenaitat saṃsyandayann āha tathā cāha [22.25] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1249: iti vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ na tv ekaś cāsau pratyavamarṣaś ceti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1253: marśād iti yady ucyeta tadā tasyāpi tattvaṃ tata ity anavasthā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1254: tathā ca yāvad antimasya tathātvaṃ na jñāyate tāvad ādimasyāpi tattvavyavasthā na syāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:1255: asatyāṃ ca tasyām ekadhīhetubhāvena vyaktīnām apy abhinna[tvam a]rpāyituṃ na śakyetety alam iha vistareṇa /
GSP28dhebta_u:1256: yasmāt tair ayaṃ vikalpo janyate tataḥ [23.1] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1259: yena smṛtitvaṃ syād ity āha tatpratibhāsina [23.1] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1261: na tu vyāvṛttir ity āha nahī[23.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1262: syād etat -- vikalpānām anarthagrāhitayā bāhyārthāsaṃsparśād eva kathaṃ gṛhītagrāhitvalakṣaṇaṃ smṛtitvam ity āścarya upasaṃhārāpadeśenāha -- tasmāt [23.4] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1263: yady evaṃ dvaidham api vikalpaḥ pratipattur adhyavasā[14b] 1yavaśād gṛhītabāhyārthagrāhitayā smṛtir ucyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:1264: tarhi paramārthataḥ kiṃviṣaya ity āha vastuta [23.7] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1265: yato 'yaṃ vikalpaḥ paramārthato nirviṣayopi pratipantradhyavasāyānurodhāt smṛtir abhipretaḥ tataḥ [23.7] tasmāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1268: abhedenābhinnākāraṃ yadvijñānaṃ tad etat smārtaṃ smṛtirūpa2m iti yobauddho vadet /
GSP28dhebta_u:1269: tasyāivaṃvādino nūnaṃ niścitaṃ vandhyāsute 'pi viṣaye yatsmaraṇaṃ tatra śaktatā sāmarthyam astu /
GSP28dhebta_u:1271: śakta iti yāvat kathaṃ tasyātyāntābhāvasmaraṇaśaktatopakalpyata iti āśaṃkāyāṃ cūrṇakenopapattim āha sāmānyasyānanubhūtatayā ananubhūtatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1274: yadi vānanubhūtepi smaraṇam upapadyate tadā vandhyāsutepy ananubhūtatvāviśeṣāt smārtā buddhiḥ kiṃ na kalpyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1278: tenāyam arthaḥ -- yuṣmān evādhyeṣya sāmānyato viśeṣataś ca etat pṛcchāma iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1280: atra svātantryaparijihīrṣayā tatkārikā upakṣipann āha -- tathā cāhe[23.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1282: tasya ekaliṅgini [23.28] gatir yugasahasreṣu bahuṣv api na vidyata [23.29] iti sambandhaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1288: asāmānyasya svalakṣaṇasya anavagatam eva liṅgaṃ liṅgijñānaṃ kariṣyatīty āha -- nace[23.23]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1293: kiṃbhūtāl liṅgāt sāmānyajñā6nasaṃhitāt sāmānyajñānayuktāt sāmānyātmanā jñātād iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:1296: tasya liṅgasya sāmānyasyodbhavas tadudbhavo [23.26] liṅgenāpareṇety arthāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1297: tenāpi sāmānyarūpatayā anumānāntarād eva jñātena tathābhāvya7m ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- anumānāntarād eva jñātene[23.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1298: astv evaṃ kā kṣatir ity āha evaṃ ce[23.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1299: nanv evaṃ liṅgānumānasyaivānantyaṃ na tu liṅgyanumānasya tat kathaṃliṅgyanumānānām ity uktam iti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:1300: satyaṃ, kevalaṃ tad evādyaṃ liṅgaṃ jñāpakahetvadhikārāt jñāyamānasāmānyarūpatayā cānumānatā (-mānena)
GSP28dhebta_u:1305_0: nanu ca sāmānyarūpasya liṅgatve tasya cānumānenaiva grahe na pratyakṣatas tanniścaya
GSP28dhebta_u:1305_1: upapadyata ity abhidhātari katham idamācāryīyaṃ sadhūmetyādinā pratyakṣatas tanniścayasyopavarṇanaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:1305_2: yujyata ity āśaṃkyāha evaṃ manyata [23.30] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1308: ayam artho -- vijātīyavyāvṛtter anyasya sāmānyasyābhāvāt vijātīyavyāvṛttyavagama eva sāmānyāvagamaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1309: vāsanādvayanibaddhaś ca vikalpaḥ svapratibhāsam eva niyataṃ bahīrūpatayā sādhāraṇatayā pratipadyamāno bāhya eva vijātīyavyāvṛttyā mayā pratīyata iti manyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1311: sa vivecita2bhedo []bheda eva vikalpena pratīyata ity uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1312: atha yadi prakṛtibhrānto 'yaṃ vikalpas tarhi kathaṃ tasya atadvyāvrttavastuprāpakatvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃvādakatvam ity āha liṅgavikalpasya ce[24.2]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1318: avaśyaṃ hi kiñcid anumitsatā dhūmādisvalakṣaṇadarśanottarakālam -- “idaṃ sādhyam idaṃ sādhanam” iti saṃkalayitavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1319: sati cāsmin saṃkalpe sataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgitayā vastudarśanābhāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1320: darśanena ca viṣayiṇā viṣayasya dṛśyasyā[48]bhidhānaṃ tena dṛśyasya liṅgaṃ(liṅga)
GSP28dhebta_u:1322: tataś ca katham svalakṣaṇadarśanāśrayo 4gamyagamakabhāvo bhaved yena kalpitadharmadvārako gamyagamakabhāvo [na bha]ved iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1326: ata eva sa eva mūle sthāpitaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1328: nanu yadi pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvināpi vikalpena sāmānyaṃ pratīyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:1329: tarhinyāyabindau yadavādi [te]na “anyatsāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ so 'numānasya viṣayaḥ” iti virudhyetety āśaṃkyāha yat tūktam i[24.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1331: evam api kim artham avadhāryata ity āha svalakṣaṇeti [24.12] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1332: svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo grāhyatvena naiva bhavatīti pratipādayitum ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1333: pūrvapakṣadvayapūrvakaṃ phakkikāyāḥ samudāyārthaṃ vyākhyāyāvayavārthaṃ vyākhyātuṃ tatra [24.13] ityādinopakra6mate /
GSP28dhebta_u:1334: ādi[?]śabdād ekavināśe sarvavināśādisaṅgrahaḥ “pratyakseṇa dṛṣṭavataḥ” {p. 271} ity asya tātparyārtham āha na tvi[24.26]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1335: kathaṃ punar asya tathāmananam anupapannam ity āha nahī[24.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1338: yadi kevalapratītis tarhi sābhāvasaṃvittibhantareṇa7 natarāṃ prasiddyatīti kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa tathāgrahaṇam upavarṇyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1340: tathāhi bhinnam abhāvam icchatāpi vastūnāṃ svarūpaṃ parānanupraviṣṭam avaśyaiṣṭavyam,
GSP28dhebta_u:1344: tāvat khalv abhāvasaṃvittir nāsti tadā8tmavad yāvat kevalagraho na bhavet /
GSP28dhebta_u:1345: tāvac ca kevalagraho nāsti yāvat nābhāvasaṃvittir iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1346: kiñca yathā kevalo 'bhāvo 'paraṇābhāvena vinā pratīyate tathā bhāvopy antareṇāparābhāvaṃ kevalaḥ kiṃ na mīyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:1355: vopi naivañ ced anavasthā prasajyate //” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1356: kathaṃ nirviṣayasya vikalpasya yathādṛṣṭabhedasya paramārthaviṣayatvam ucyata ity āha[49]niścayetyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:1365: sa eva viṣayo 'dhyavasāyavaśād yasyeti sa tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1368: ” evaṃ tubhaṭṭā3rcaṭena kathaṃ na vyākhyātam iti na pratīmaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1369: pramāṇalakṣaṇasāmānyena yogam upadarśya pramāṇaviśeṣasya pratyakṣasyāpi lakṣaṇena yogaṃ darśayann āha sad iti / /
GSP28dhebta_u:1372_0: cakṣur indriyāpekṣayā granthasyāsya yojanāyāṃ tu indriyasya nāyanaraśmyavayavina
GSP28dhebta_u:1372_1: indriyasyānu4mānasiddhasya saṃbhāradaṃśena saṃyoge saṃbandhe saty asya vikalpasya
GSP28dhebta_u:1374: syāt tasya cārthena saṃgatiḥ [Ślokavā. 4.60] ityādivacanāt svābhimānāt pratyakṣatvenendriyam udāharaṇīkṛtaṃ pareṇa /
GSP28dhebta_u:1375: na punaḥ pratipādyapratipādakayor buddhisāmyaviṣayo dṛṣṭānto bhavitum arhati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1378: ādyami[25.12]ty etad vyācakṣāṇa āha ādau [25.14] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1380: ādau bhavam iti tv artha[ḥ] yasyārthasyetyādinā svalakṣaṇenāsādhāraṇasyaivopalakṣaṇād asādhāraṇaviṣayaṃ svalakṣaṇam iti vyācaṣṭe /
GSP28dhebta_u:1384: nanu ca tasyāsaṃkīrṇarūpatā [na] svataḥ kiṃ tv abhāvāṃśasadbhāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1385: tat katham evam abhidhīyata ity āśaṃkya kāraṇam āha tathāhī[25.26]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:1387: sa evābhāvāṃśaḥ [25.28] parābhāvo na siddhyet parātmava7d iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1389: sā [26.1] saṃkīrṇarūpatā kathaṃ na yuktimatīty āha svahetubale[26.2]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1392: nanu tena tasya saṃkīrṇarūpasya vināśa[ne] parābhāvena sarveṣām eva bhāvānām udayakṣaṇād ūrdhvam abhāvād abhāvaika8rasaṃ jagat syād iti prasaṃjayituṃ yuktaṃ na bhū(tu)
GSP28dhebta_u:1398: iha khalu bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgitvepi sadṛśāparāparakṣaṇodayād vastusantānaviṣayā pratītir asti na tv abhāvaviṣa[16a] 1yaiva /
GSP28dhebta_u:1401: udayottarakālam avyavadhānena vastuviṣayā ca pratītiḥ katham upapadyeta yadi sa evābhāvaḥ pūrvasiddhaṃ saṃkīrṇarūpaṃ vināsyād anyasaṃ(vināśyāty adasaṃ)
GSP28dhebta_u:1403: sati caivaṃ varaṃ svahetor eva tathāvidhātām udayos tv ity ucyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1404: hetutvenārthākriyākāritvena vasturūpatvād abhāva2rūpataiva hīyetety etad upekṣe(kṣyai)
GSP28dhebta_u:1409: prathamaṃ saṃkīrṇarūpāṇām utpādobhyupeyate paścād asaṃkīrṇarūpāṇām udayam upagantum -- kā punar atra hānir ity āśaṃkyāha kimi[26.5]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:1410: kaścit kila parivrāḍaśucau patitaṃ {p. 279} modakaṃ karaṇa gṛhṇan kenacit sotprāsaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ ” kim aśucer modakam udgrhṇāsi” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1416: yathā ca tatra tanmatam “atraiva tyaktavya evāyam” tadā kim aśucim rakṣitasyānnasya grahaṇena,
GSP28dhebta_u:1419: yadi tv abhāvata evāsaṃkīrṇarūpāṇāṃ paścād utpādo 'bhyupetavyo 4varaṃ prathamata eva tathābhūtānām udayo 'bhyupagamyatām ity ābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1423: pratykṣabalena [26.13] ity asya tātparyārthaṃ darśayann āha -- yadi tu [26.13] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1426: tathā saty api smṛtir na syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1427: vyāptigrāhakapramāṇānadhigatasya viśiṣṭadeśādivartitad asādhāraṇarūpasya grahaṇād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1429: yam abhāvapratītiḥ kena pramāṇeneṣṭā yenāsyāḥ prāmāṇyam ācāryeṇa nivāryata ity āśaṃkyācāryasyābhiprāyaṃ 6parisphuṭayann āha -- nābhāve[26.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1430: kasmāt punar etat pratītijanakatvenānyad a[bhā]vākhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavati,
GSP28dhebta_u:1431: eṣā ca tatphalam ity āha nahī[26.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1432: ākriyate adhyavasīyata iti ākāro [26.21] viśeṣo vyāvṛttir eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:1438: anadhigamād iti [27.10] vastuno viśeṣaṇatvenāgrahaṇād iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1449: atha mā bhūt sāmānyam arthakriyāsādhanaṃ vyaktis tāvat tatsādhanībhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1450: [16b] 1tadadhyavasāyitayaiva ca vidhivikalpaḥ pramāṇaṃ kiṃ na bhavatīty āśaṃkya na tatra prāmāṇyam iti [27.24] dūrasthena sambandhaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1456: yena tvayaivam ucyata ity āha tataḥ param i[27.19]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:1458: tatoyam arthaḥ -- yasmād evam ucyate pūrvapakṣavādinety arthāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1459: evam abhidhāne 'pi kathaṃ tadadhyavasāya ukto bhavatīty āśaṃkyāha tatreti [27.21] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1460: jātim atiriktām adhigacchato 'sya prāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṃkyoktam evārtham adhikavidhānārtham anuvadann āha jātes tv iti [27.24] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1464: apūrvārthavijñānatvasya pramāṇalakṣaṇasyābhāvād abhipretya na prāmāṇyam ity uktam /

GSP28dhebta_u:2004: dayādi dānacetanādikāryatvena niścitaṃ kenacid yena tatrāpy abhyāsāt tathāniścayaḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2007: tad ayam artho yenāsakṛd vahnyāder dāhādyanubhūtaṃ sa tadā phalasya parokṣatvepi dāhādijananayogyam etad iti pratyakṣeṇa niścinoty eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:2009_1: apy abhyāse sa eva puruṣaḥ puruṣā7ntaranirapekṣo muktādeḥ kṛttimādirūpatāṃ svayam eva pratipadyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:2010: tathānabhyāsāvasthāyāṃ svatas tadyogyatāniścayepi abhyāsāditaḥ paṭimapratyakṣaṃ svayam eva tadyogyaṃ niścāyayiṣyatīti kiṃ nānumanyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:2012: kiñ ca na vyāptismaraṇam antareṇānumānaṃ pravartate /
GSP28dhebta_u:2013: na cāgnyā8di vastu dṛṣṭvā tatsādhyārthakriyāvāñchayā pravṛttau yad yad evam arthakriyākāri yathā mahānasādi dṛṣṭaṃ tadvastv iti pravṛttau(tteḥ)
GSP28dhebta_u:2014: prāgvyāptismaraṇaṃ saty avādinā vadituṃ śakyata iti kathaṃ tatrānumānasya pravartakatvakalpanā na sāhasam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2015: ataś caivaṃ yatas tādrūpyāvasāye pratyakṣaṃ nānumānasāpekṣamanavasthāprasakteḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2016: yathā ca tasya pāṭavaṃ tādrupyaniścaye [23a] 1caritārtham upavarṇanīyam,
GSP28dhebta_u:2017: tathā yogyatāniścaye kiṃ na varṇyata ity alam ativistareṇa /
GSP28dhebta_u:2018: yat tu tac cānumeyatāṃ nātipatati [40.19] tat svaparasaṃtānavartinīr buddhīr adhikṛtyoktam “anyatrānubhūtaviṣayebhya” iti vacanād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2019: atra ca sarvatra samādhānaṃ dhīmadbhir eva vidheyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2021: kṛtakatvādau pāramārthikaṃ [41.24] sādhyasādha2nayor dharmiṇiścabhedaṃ [41.24] bhinnaṃ rūpaṃ nālamba[te] nāśrayate /
GSP28dhebta_u:2024: ekasminn arthe dvayoḥ samavāya ekārthasamavāyo [41.26]tra vivakṣitaḥ kṛtakatvānityatve [41.26] ādī yasya tasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:2030: kathaṃ punaḥ kṛtakatvādeḥ śabdādau vṛttāv ātmādivrttir āsaṃjyata ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:2033: “na ca saṃyogavannānātvaṃ bhāvavalliṅgāviśeṣāt viśeṣaliṅgā4bhāvāc ca tasmād bhāvavat sarvatraikaḥ samavāya” [Praśa.Bh. pr. 172] iti vacanād ekatvenābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2034: athāpi syāt na samavāyād vṛttir api tu samavāya eva vṛttir iti tad apy avadyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2035: saṃbandhābhāvena bhāvoyaṃ vrttir iti kalpanāyā ayogāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2037: yadi ca samavāyas tasya vrttir ātmādiṣv api tasya bhāvāt5 kathaṃ na tasya vṛttir iti tadavastho doṣa iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2039: etasminn upagame gaḍḍapraveśe 'kṣitārānirgamvṛttānto jāta iti darśayann āha saiva tarhī[42.8]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2044: abhūtvā yo na bhavati bhūtvā ca [na] vinaśyati sa tadviparītarūpas tasya yaḥ samāropas tasya vyavacchedaḥ sa viṣayo [42.9] yasyās tasyāḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2045: sā kim a6vaśyābhyupagamanīyā yenānyasyopagamo niṣidhyata ity āha saiveti [42.8] /
GSP28dhebta_u:2046: paramārthena bhedo dharmiṇā sahety arthāt tadvatoḥ paramārthabhedavattvañ ca parābhiprāyeṇoktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2048: taddharmatānapekṣāyāntu nityābhimateṣv api tau varteyātām iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2049: utpattivināśadharmatāyāḥ kalpanābuddheś cāntarāle ghāṭāmastakāntarālavartimāṃsapiṇḍāparanāma gaḍur iva gaḍu[42.11]r niṣphalatvāt tena /
GSP28dhebta_u:2052: yadi kṛtakatvādayo dharmā vyatirekiṇastava dharmiṇi pramāṇasiddhāḥ syus tadā satyām api tasya vastunas tathātāyāmajāgalastanavadanupayuktā api kena nāma nābhyupagamyeran /
GSP28dhebta_u:2054: kevalaṃ tad eva pramāṇasiddhatvaṃ na saṃbhavati pratyakṣapramāṇavādhitatvam eva lakṣyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2055: {p. 296} atha kiṃ kalpanāniveśinaḥ kṛtakatvādayo dharmāḥ sādhyadharmam avabodhayanti yenāvaśyābhyupagamanītyāyā(nīyāyā)
GSP28dhebta_u:2056: utpattivināśadharmatāyā eva tathāvidhabuddhinibandhanatvāt kim anyenety ucyata ity āśaṃkāyām abhyupagama [23b] 1evotpattir(vottara)
GSP28dhebta_u:2058: sattāmātreṇa [42.12] tanniścāyakajñānanirapekṣeṇa svarūpeṇa vastuna utpatteḥ prabhṛti sarvadeti veditavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2059: anavarataṃ [42.14] satataṃ taddharmasya sādhyadharmasya pratītis tasyāḥ prasaṅgāt [42.14] /
GSP28dhebta_u:2060: kathaṃ nāma te tatpratītinibandhanaṃ bhavatīty āha kiṃtv i[42.14]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2061: nanu vastvasaṃsparśitve vikalpasya kathaṃ vastunaḥ kṛtakatvādirūpa2tāpratītir ity āha sa ce[42.15]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2064: tadagrāhiṇaḥ kathaṃ tadadhyavasāya ity āha paramparaye[42.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2067: nanu ca na kṛtakatvādayo dharmās tathāvidhabuddhinibandhanatveneṣyante kintv a3rthakriyākāritayā,
GSP28dhebta_u:2068: tat kathaṃ tathāvidhavikalpaḥ syād yataḥ prasavet (vikalpasya tataḥ prasavaḥ) /
GSP28dhebta_u:2069: tasya tasya dharmasya vaiyarthyam ity āha tadvyatiriktās tv i[42.18]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2071: tasmād abhūtvābhavanadharmaṇo bhūtvā cābhāvanadharmaṇo dharmiṇo vyatiriktā anye tasyāḥ kalpanābuddher utpattis tasyā nimittaṃ kevalaṃ nimittamātram [42.18] tadbhāvastayā /
GSP28dhebta_u:2073: dharmiṇo 'nyo na syāt tarhi kṛtakādibuddhir anubhavasiddhā nirnibandhanā syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2074: na caivam ato 'sty etadbuddhikārī kṛtakatvād iti (dir iti)
GSP28dhebta_u:2078: tathāpi tathāvidhād bhāvād anye te tannibandhanaṃ kalpyaṃtām ity āha tadvaram i[42.19]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:2081: “atraivedaṃ kṛtakatvādi nātmādiṣu” ity evaṃrūpā tasyā yannibandhanam abhūtvābhavanadharmatādi tad eva tathāvidhavikalpaprasavanimittaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:2082: varam astu [42.20] / hetum asyāniṣṭer āha tasye[42.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2083: astu tadabhyupagamas tathāpi kathaṃ tasya vaiyarthyam ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:2085: caritārthā [42.21] anyena niṣpāditaprayojanā vyatirekavantaḥ [42.21] tadvyatiriktāḥ kalpanānirmitāstu te saṃtu /
GSP28dhebta_u:2087: syād etat -- yadi vyatiriktānityatādidharmayogepi vastuna evāvasthāyitvādirūpaṃ vyavahartāraḥ pratipādayanti,
GSP28dhebta_u:2088: tadā tasya bhūtvābhavanadharmatādyupagame tadupagame ca tasyaitadbuddhinibandhanatvasya yujyamānatvāc caritārthā vyatirekiṇo dharmā ta bha(dharmā bha)
GSP28dhebta_u:2089: veyur yāvatā vyatiriktānityatādibhāve tad eva vyavahartāraḥ pratipadyante /
GSP28dhebta_u:2090: tat kathaṃ yad eva tatkalpanānibandhanam ityādyucyamānaṃ parabhāgaṃ puṣṇātīty āśaṃkyāha avaśyañ ce[42.22]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2092: vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe vā /
GSP28dhebta_u:2093: anityatāgrahaṇaṃ copalakṣaṇaṃ tena kṛtakatvādāv api yathā8yogam eva tatpratyayaṃ pratipadyante [42.23] niścinvanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2096: kasmād avastvātmānaṃ te tathā pratīyantīty āha tasmād anavasthāyīsvabhāvasyānurūpā samīcīnocitā yā arthakriyā tadarthitayā pravṛtteḥ [42.24] pravartanāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2099: vyatiri[24a] 1ktānityatāyāṃ satyāṃ nityatvāt [42.25] sthiratvāt tasya śabdādivastunaḥ prastāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2100: nityatvādi[42.25]ti bruvāṇasyāyam āśayo bhinnanityatāyogepi vastuno nānyathātvaṃ tasyās tatrākiñcit karatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2103: mānasya tasyākāśāder iva nityatvavyavastheti vastuno nityatvāddhe[42.25]tos tasya nityatvasya 2vastuno yo 'vagamas tenārthi[65]tve nyāyaprāpte sati ayam anumātād i(tā ani)
GSP28dhebta_u:2104: tyśabdādipadārthasādhyārthakriyārthī -- [42.25][66]itis tasmāc chabdādikaṃ nityam āśaṃkamānaḥ [42.26] tad asaṃdehe 'numānāyogāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2105: tathā sandihānaḥ kiṃ kasmād vastuno 'nityatāvicāraṃ pratyāhitāsthaḥ [42.26] kṛtatātparyārthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2106: anityatāyās tadvyatiriktatvād tasya sthirātmatāniścayād eva3 tatsaṃśayapūrvakānityatāvicārasyaivāyogād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2111: tatra nityatve prayojye hetau tṛtīyā pratyeyā /
GSP28dhebta_u:2112: vyatiriktāyām anityatāyāṃ vastunas tathā vicāro na yujyata iti pratipādya doṣāntaram api tasyāṃ darśayann āha vyatiriktāyāṃ ce[43.1]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2113: tatraiva pratipannāyām anityatāyāṃ na vastuny apratipanna ity arthāt sūcitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2120: vyatiriktānityatāprapipattāv api vastunas tathātvapratītiḥ kathaṃ yujyata ityādidoṣaśatam utpaśyan sotprāsam āha tad etad i[43.4]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2123: kathañci[43.4]t kenacid rūpeṇa yo bhedas tasyopagame kiñcitkalam utpaśyāmo [43.10] notpre6kṣāmahe /
GSP28dhebta_u:2124: yadi kathaṃcid bhedo na syād bhedādhiṣṭhānaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ katham upapadyetoyonu(dyetety āha) sādhye[43.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2126: {p. 298} sādhyadharmasya sādhanadharmarūpatopagame sati bhedopagame phalaṃ na kiñcid iti pratipādya saṃpratyekātmasādhyasādhanayor bheda eva na saṃbhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:2130: kathaṃcit kenāpi svabhāvena yo bhedaḥ [43.12] kṛtakatvānityatvayoḥ sa na yuktaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2132: yena dharmisvabhāvena tayor abheda iṣyate tasmād ekasmāt[67]svabhāvabhedāt tayo[43.12]r dharmayor iti prastāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2133: yena svabhāvena tayor a[43.13]bhedas tenāpi [na] bheda eva yenāyaṃ doṣaḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2134: ki8ntu tatopi svabhāvāt tayoḥ kṛtakatvānityatvayoḥ kathaṃcid bhedābhedau na bheda evābheda eve(eva ve)ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2135: yena svabhāvenābhinnāv iṣyete tadekasvabhāvād api bhedavato[43.14]r bhidyamānayoḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2136: tena bhedāvadhinā svabhāvena kathañcid abhedanimittam [43.14] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2137: yady abhedo neṣyate tadaikāntiko bheda eva syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2138: sati caivaṃ pūrvako doṣa iti prāyeṇo[24b] 1ktam //
GSP28dhebta_u:2139: tenāpy a[43.16]bhedanimittenābhinnena svabhāvena kathaṃcid bhedanimittam iti prastāvād boddhavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2142_0: atrāpi yadi tena svabhāvena tayor abheda eva bhavet tadaikāntiko 'bheda eva tadā
GSP28dhebta_u:2142_1: ca kalpanāv abhāsibhedanibandhanaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ syāt tathā cāsmanmatānupraveśaprasaṅga
GSP28dhebta_u:2143: abheda2nimitte bhedanimitte ca svbhāvāntare 'bhyupagate mābhūd aikāntiko 'bhedo bhedo veti punas tathābhūtasvabhāvāntarābhyupagamo nyāyaprāptaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2144: punas tatrāpy evam ity abhiprāyavānitiśabdahetāv abhiprāyāha anantaive[43.16]ti (-prāyavān āha ity anantaiveti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2151: bhedapakṣabhāvinā saṃbandhābhāvena sādhyasādhanabhāvāyogād ityādīnāṃ doṣāṇāṃ katham anavasaro
GSP28dhebta_u:2153: itopi bhinnābhinnarūpobhayadharmāsaṃbhava iti saṃkṣepeṇāha yaś ce[43.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2154: purodhāya [43.20] puraskrtya vikalpabuddhyā ālambyeti 4yāvat kalpanāghaṭitasya pratiṣedhāt pāramārthika [43.24] ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:2165: bhavato 'smād abhidhānapratyayāv iti bhāvaḥ [45.5] kāryatvam i[45.5]tyādinā tam evābhivyanakti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2168: anenaitad āha -- yady adṛśyaṃ tasya karaṇaṃ syāt tat katham akaraṇasyendhanāder bhedam anuvi[da]dhyād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2169: indhanabhedānuvidhānaṃ dhūmasya pratipādya vahnibhedānuvidhānaṃ pratipādayann āha -- alpe[45.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2170: alpaś ca mahāṃś cālpamahāntau tau ca tāv indhanavikārau ca tatkāriṇaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2171: prātipadikagrahaṇe na hi tadantasya grahaṇam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2173: tadanurūpasyā[45.27]lpamahato vā dhūmasya darśanād iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2174: adṛśyātmano 'gnyādisāmagryāṃ niyataṃ sannidhāna7m upekṣyāgnyāder eva kāryaṃ dhūma iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2175: etat sādhikām upapattim abhidhāyādhunā tanniyatasannidhānam eva tasya na yujyata iti darśayann āha na ce[45.28]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2178: tasyaivādṛśyasya tadanantaraṃ bhāvān na dhūmaḥ syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2183: [69]atrāpi vṛkṣendhanayor api tathābhāvakalpanāyāṃ tad evottara[46.5]m iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2185: vṛkṣādibhāve niyatasannidher adṛśyātmanaḥ kutaścid indhanasya bhāva iti punar a[46.6]prathame codye [25a] 1parakīya eva[70]eva vākya(vṛkṣa)
GSP28dhebta_u:2188: vṛkṣādikāraṇatvaṃ tasya vṛkṣādeḥ svahetor eva [46.5] bījāder bhāvadarśanād i[46.5]ti parihāraḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2189: tatrāpy adaśyātmano niyatasannidher ityādicodyaparihārayor ābhīkṣūnyenānavasthānāt paryavasānaṃ ca (naṃ na) syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2192: yadi va tasyāpy adṛśyasya bhāve niyatasannidhāna[na]paramadṛśyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate?
GSP28dhebta_u:2194: tathātrāpy evam ity anavasthā na vyavasthitaḥ kāryakāraṇabhavo bhaved ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2195: athavā tatrāpi [46.5] vṛkṣādau tathābhāvakalpanāyām [46.5] dṛśyabhāvakalpanāyāṃ pareṇa kriyamāṇāyāṃ tad evottara[3m indhanā]der vṛkṣādibhedānuvidhānāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2197: nāpi vṛkṣādikāraṇatvam adṛśyātmano vṛkṣādeḥ svahetor eva bījāder bhāvadarśanad iti {p. 300} ca /
GSP28dhebta_u:2199: bījādibhāve niyatasannidher ityādau punaś codye [46.6] ca parasya sa eva bījādibhedānuvi4dhānād ityādy anaṃtarokto 'smākaṃ parihārah [46.6] paracodyapratividhānam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2201: etene [46.6]ndhanādeḥ svahetor eva vṛkṣāder bhāvadarśanād ti vacanasāmarthyāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:2202: yasya yasmād bhāvo dṛśyate tasya tatkāraṇatvam iti pratipāditena /
GSP28dhebta_u:2203: yasyā eva sāmagryā agnīndhanāder utpattis tasyā eva taddrśyatva5m upajāyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2204: ekasāmagryadhīnatā [46.7] tayor niyatasannidhānanimittaṃ sāpi pratyuktā pratyākhyātā kasyacid bhāve vijñāyamānasyaiva tatkāryatvavyavasthāsiddheḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2205: tadbhāve 'nupalabhyamānasya tu tatkāryatvakalpanāyām atiprasaṃgād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2206: atraiva vaktavyāntaraṃ samuccivann āha tad i[46.7]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2221: tkāraṇatvam upetyāpi7 nāsmatpratijñātasya kācit kṣatir iti pratipādayitum āha rūpantv iti (bhavatv iti) [46.12] /
GSP28dhebta_u:2222: [72]yato [46.14] vahnyādeḥ kāraṇatvahāneḥ agnyāder anyasyāpi[73]bhāvaḥ [bhāve] dhūmaṃ prati kāraṇatvena kathaṃ na agnyādeḥ kāraṇatvahāniḥ [46.14] /
GSP28dhebta_u:2223: kathañ ca tanniṣcayena pravṛttau na visamvāda ity āśaṃkyāha tasya (?) /
GSP28dhebta_u:2225: dṛṣṭasya kāraṇasya hānam abhāvo na hy akāraṇatvena pratītasya kāraṇatvahānir ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2227: atatprāpti[46.16]r dṛṣṭakāraṇāprāptiḥ prasajyata āpadyate aneneti prasaṅgāpādanam atiśayitaḥ prasaṅgo 'tiprasaṃgas tenālaṃ [46.16] na kiñcit /
GSP28dhebta_u:2228: nanu ca tadbhāve bhāvas tadabhāve 'bhāvaś ca [25b] 1kāryadharmāv imau tat katham ayam eva kāryakāraṇabhāva uty ucyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:2229: kāryabhāva iti tu yuktaṃ vaktum iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2230_0: satyam etat kevalam etasmin kāryadharme kathite kāraṇadharmopi svabhāve bhāvo bhāvanaṃ
