GSP28dhebta_u:3986: yadi ca pratyekabhāvināṃ doṣāṇāṃ militāvasthāyāṃ guḍanāgarāder abhāvopadarśanenaitat pratiṣidhyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:3987: tadā pratyekabhāvināṃ doṣāṇāṃ samudāyāvasthāyām api bhāvadarśanāt kim asmad abhimataṃ cānupa(nābhyupa)
GSP28dhebta_u:3989: yadi vā samudāyāvasthāyāṃ teṣāṃ doṣāṇām asadbhāve sādhye pratyekabhāvitvād ity asya hetoḥ sādhāraṇānaikantikatvaṃ darśayitum āha -- pratyekam i[106.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3990: yat pratyetyekaṃ yasya kāryasya nidānaṃ [106.17] nimittaṃ svatas tad yadi svahetubalān mibhrama[106.17]nyasahitam evādhikaraṇam utpadyate tadā kiṃ 4tatkāryakāri tatra dṛṣṭam?
GSP28dhebta_u:3991: [106.18] kṣepe kimaḥ prayogād dṛṣṭam evety arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3992: sneho hi kaphahetur ūṣṇatvaṃ ca pittakṛddṛṣṭaṃ sahitāvasthāyām api te tatkāryakāriṇī dṛṣṭe yathā amūmāṣaṅgate,
GSP28dhebta_u:3993: ata eva yathā māṣa [106.18] ity udāharati /
GSP28dhebta_u:3994: māṣo hi snigdhatvād ūṣṇavīryatvāc cobhayātmaka ubhayam eva kāryaṃ kaphapittalakṣaṇaṃ karotīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3996: śleṣmā kasmān na jāyate kaṭukāyā api pippalyāḥ kuto na pittaṃ yenāsmad uktaṃ bhavatā vyabhicāryate /
GSP28dhebta_u:3997: tathāpy abhāve vā guḍānnāgarāc ca tau doṣau mā bhūtām iti parasya matam āśaṃkya dṛṣṭasyopapattiprakāraṃ darśayitum āha śaktyapekṣañ ce[106.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4000: kiṃ tatkāryaṃ mādhuryādi guṇamātraṃ nibandhanaṃ na bhavatīti praśne 'bhyupagama evottaraṃ kurvann āha -- guṇeti [106.19] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4001: ācāraviśeṣānavacchinnaḥ kevalo mādhuryādiguṇo guṇamātraṃ tad anibandhanam [106.19] akāraṇaṃ yasya tat tathoktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4002: śaktyapekṣatvepi kāryasya tasyāḥ sarvatra bhāvāt tadavastho [doṣa] 7ity āha sarvatreti [106.20] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4003: tāsāṃ [106.20] śaktīnāṃ kiñcid eva kāryaṃ kasyacid eva janyatayā sambandhī bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4004: ayam artho madhuratvāviśeṣepi kiñcid eva svahetusamudbhūtarūpaviśeṣaṃ yat tathākāryakāri na tat sarvam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4005: taddhetos tajjananaḥ svabhāvaḥ kutastya iti cet,
GSP28dhebta_u:4008: nnatvādi8doṣo hi bhedamātre prasajyamāno na bhedasya śaktiviśeam apekṣate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4009: na ca bhedasya {p. 351} viśeṣa eva saṃbhavati militāvasthāyām api tādrūpyād eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:4011: tasmād guṇamātranibandhanaṃ yatkāryaṃ tad yathā sati tasmin bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4012: tathā bhedābhedamātre saṃbhavino doṣā ye te tadbhāve kathaṃ na syur iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4013_0: bhedābhedābhyām utpatti[47a] 1dharmatvam amīṣāṃ doṣāṇām abhyupetya sarvam idam uktam
GSP28dhebta_u:4013_1: adhunā tu tādātmyād eva teṣām anivāryatvam āyātam iti pratipādayituṃ guḍanāgarādau
GSP28dhebta_u:4013_2: pareṇa dṛṣṭāntīkṛte janyadoṣāṇām anyathaivānupapattim abhyupagacchann āha virodhī[106.24]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4015: sannidhis tasmād virodhiśunyād guḍāder janma yasya doṣasya sa tajjanmā na bhaved a[106.23]pi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4017: tu doṣaḥ, sa tu tasminnātmabhūte bhede abhede cāniṣtopi na nivartate [106.24] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4019: idam atrārthasatattvaṃ bhidyamānaṃ hi rūpaṃ bhedo viparyayeṇa cābhedaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4020: vibhinne ca te syātām ityādinā ca vastutas tadātmaka eva doṣo darśitaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4022: anya3d api dūṣaṇaṃ vastuto bhedābhedātmakam eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:4023: vyāvṛttikṛtas tu bhedo yadi bhaved bhavatu na tāvatā prakṛtakṣatir iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4024: tanmate 'vasthāntarāvayavinaḥ sattvam upetyaitad uktam idānī tu sa eva nāstīti darśayitum āha bhāgā eva ce[106.25]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4027: tena tena prakāreṇādhisti4ryagūrddhvāvasthānalakṣaṇena tattadarthakriyākāritvalakṣaṇena ca saṃniviṣtā [106.25] vyavasthitāḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4031: tadabhāvāc ca kena saha teṣāṃ bhedābhedacintā syād iti cābhipretam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4032: nanv asaty ekasminn avayavini dhāraṇākarṣane katham upapadyeyātām ity āha -- anyo 'nye[106.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4034: eka sāmagryadhīnatvād anyonyakāraṇādhīnāpekṣāḥ santas tathāvasthitavapuṣo yenaikasyākarṣane dhārane vānyeṣām api te bhavata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4035: na kevalaṃ dṛṣṭahetubalāt teṣāṃ tathāsthitir api tv adṛṣṭavaśād apīti darśayann āha -- karmaṇāṃ ce[106.28]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4036: lokasyāsādhāraṇacetanātmakarmaṇām api sāmarthyāt te 'vinirbhāgavarti6naḥ [106.28] parasparaṃ vibhāgena na vartante /
GSP28dhebta_u:4037: nanu cākāraṇasya karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyopavarṇanam ayuktam ity āśaṃkyāha sanniveśane[106.29]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4040: {p. 352} iti vacanāt karmabhir janitā [106.30] ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4041: teṣām eva prāṇināṃ sādhāraṇair asādhārarṇavau karmabhiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4042: tebhyaḥ [106.30] karmasya eva tadādhipatyād eveti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:4044: athāsaty ekasminn avayavini ekoyaṃ ghaṭa ityādi vyapadeśaḥ kathaṃ syād ity āśaṃkyāha -- te ce[106.31]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4046_0: nanu caiko ghaṭa ityādi śabdajanmani śabdānuviddhe jñāne tāvatkiñcid ekatvena pratyavabhāsate
GSP28dhebta_u:4046_1: tad eva ca svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇatvenādhyavasāyāt ta katham abhe8dino 'rthasyāpalāpaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:4048: ayam abhiprāyo yadi śabdagocaro 'rthaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ syāt tadendriyaprabhavepi pratyaye tathaiva pratibhāseta /
GSP28dhebta_u:4050: na caikam eva rūpam upāyabhede 'pi bhinnākārāvabhāsi yuktam / tad uktam
GSP28dhebta_u:4052: evaṃ tarhi śabdapratyayagocara eva kiñcid ekaṃ tāvad āstām /
GSP28dhebta_u:4053: tato na sarvathaikasyābhāvaḥ sidhyatīty āha aspaṣte[107.1]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4056: ayam arthas tatrāpi jñāne ta eva bhāgā a[vi]vecitabhedāḥ pratīyante na tu tadatiriktaṃ kiñcid ekam api /
GSP28dhebta_u:4057: adhyavasāyānu2rodhena ca ta evety uktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4058: yatau bhāgātiriktaṃ nirbhāgadṛśyam anupalabhyamānam asadvyavahāragocaraḥ tata[107.2]s tasmāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4063: punar api nirbhāgamaṅgīkṛtya siṃhāvalokitanyāyena dūṣaṇāntaram āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4065: bhinno deṣo yasya sa cāsāv aṃśaś ceti padasaṃskāraṃ kṛtvā paścād anekaśabdena saha 3karmadhārayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4067: ayam āśayo yadi tat sāṃśaṃ syāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:4069: na tu niraṃśaṃ sat tathā kartum utsahata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4070: nanu pratīyate tāvad ekasyānekabhinnadeśāṃśayogitā tatra kiṃ katham etad iti vimṛṣṭena /
GSP28dhebta_u:4079: ity abhiprāyavataḥ parasya vacanam āśaṅkamāna āha pratīteś cedi[107.4]ti yady apy atroktam eva dūṣaṇaṃ na nirvikalpe nāpi vikalpe jñāne tadekamanubhāsata ityadi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4084: ye paryāyāḥ sthemānaṃ [107.5] sthairyaṃ dadhataḥ pratīyante [107.5] yat tadornityam abhisaṃbandhātte 5kṣaṇadhvaṃsānubhāvinaḥ kutaḥ kasmān matā [107.5] iti yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4085: anenaitad āha pratītiśaraṇāś ced bhavantas tadā katham anyathā pratīyamānā anyathā anugamyanta iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4086: punaḥ parasya vacanam āśaṃkamāna āha -- anyata [107.6] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4087: anyato bādhakāt pramāṇāt tanmatā ity abhisambandhavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4088: iha prakṛte tad bādhakaṃ pamāṇaṃ samaṃ [107.6] tulya6m atrāpi taddhita ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4089: uktepi dṛśyānupalambhādau bādhake 'nyad api bādhakaṃ darśyann āha -- aikāntikāv i[107.7]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4091: tayor anyonyānupraveśamukhena bheda evābheda eva veti niyamavantāv aikāntikāu syātām /
GSP28dhebta_u:4093: athaikātmyetpi paryāyā eva bhidyante na dharmī dharme (?)
GSP28dhebta_u:4094: ca na bhidya7te na tu paryāyā ity āśaṃkyāha -- anyonyaṃ ve[107.8]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4095: viruddhadharmādhyāsasya ekatvabādhakasya bhāvād bheda eva niyato [107.8]vaśyaṃbhāvīty abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4096: ananyatvepi nāyaṃ doṣo bhinnarūpasyāpi bhāvād iti parasya vacanam āśaṃkamāna āha tayor apī[107.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4097: apiśabdo bhinnakamo bheda ity asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4100: apiśabdadarśitam abhedam api dūṣayann āha dravye[107.12]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4105: abhede svabhāvānupraveśe tayoḥ svātmahāniḥ [107.14] dravyarūpatā paryāyarūpatā ca hīyeta,
GSP28dhebta_u:4108: ta [107.15] ity anenoktaṃ bahutvam evāha dharmī[107.16]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4109_1: trayāṇām abhedasiddhyarthaṃ kalpyate yadi tatrāpi sa eva doṣa iti punaḥ svabhāvāntarakalpane
GSP28dhebta_u:4111: kuta evaṃ syād ity āha tattantratvād i[107.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4113: kayos tattantratvam ity apekṣāyām {p. 354} āha -- tad anyayor i[107.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4114: tasmād ekasvabhāvād anyayor dravyaparyāyayor bhedasyābhedasya ca tanmūlatvāt tattantratvaṃ pratyeyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4115: astu tarhi tasya tathātvam anekātmakatvaṃ ca vastunaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4116: na ca dṛṣṭasyānavasthayā apalāpaḥ ka3rtuṃ śakya ity āha -- na caivam i[107.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4120: iti[107.21]r hetau / bahubhāṣitayā alaṃ [107.21] na kiñcit /
GSP28dhebta_u:4122_0: avaśyamo bhā4va āvaśyakam ity asya bhāvapratyayāntatvād apṛkkaraṇasyāvaśyakam iti
GSP28dhebta_u:4122_1: prāpte yoyam āvaśyakam apṛthakkaraṇam i[108.1]ti prayoge sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:4122_2: saḥ katham iti tu na jāne mahānta eva praṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4123: saṃyogavibhāgeṣu [108.11] kartavyeṣu anapekṣo [108.11] na kāraṇam iti rūpādivargābhiprāyeṇānapekṣa5sya tat kāraṇamātraṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4127: saṃyogavibhāgāpekṣayā tv anapekṣo na kāraṇaṃ kintu sāpekṣa eva kāraṇam iti vivakṣitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4129: na tu kasyacid anyānapekṣasyaiva kāraṇatvam asti yenānapekṣo 'kāraṇam ity ucyamānaṃ śobheta /
GSP28dhebta_u:4131: tad yathā tantuturīsaṃyogalakṣaṇo guṇaḥ paṭaturīsaṃyoge kartavye paṭaṃ paścādbhāvinam apekṣate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4132: yathā ca vaṃśādau pāṭanākhyā7vayavakarmajo 'vayavāntarād vibhāgaḥ paścādbhāvinaṃ dravyavināśam apekṣya sakriyasyāvayavasyākāśādideśād vibhāgam ārabhate,
GSP28dhebta_u:4133: yathā cāsau na kriyājo vibhāgaḥ kintu vibhāgaja eveti vibhāgajaṃ vibhāgam abhyupagacchadbhirvaiśeṣikair iṣyate tathā nehāprakṛtatvād ucyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4138: “[133]yuṣmad asmadbhyām anyatarasyām khañ” ity anena khaña kartavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4150: nanu ca manaskārādisamudāyajanyam idam ekam upadarśitam etatsāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭaikajanyaṃ tu kiṃ na darśitam ity āha tadanyad i[111.13]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4152: na tv ekajanyaṃ nāma kiñcit saṃbhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4156: tyādyabhidhānād evaitad ūhituṃ śakyam ity ahiprāyeṇa ca sva[134]yam ūhyam i[111.13]ty āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4157: nanu kiṃ bhāgato viśeṣavṛttir yena3 bahuvacanena nirdeśa ity āha[135]tajjanyāpekṣayā ce[111.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4163: kutaḥ svabhāvabhedavattvaṃ tasyety apekṣāyāṃ yojyam kāryāntare[112.1]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4164: pṛthivyādīny upādāya vartanta ity upādāya rūpaṃ [112.5] parasparādi mayūravyaṃsakāditvāt samāsaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4170: nanūpakāraka ādhāro na tu janakas tat katham evam ucyata ity āha nahī[112.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4179: kathaṃ tatrākiñcitkaratvaṃ tasya sa6hakāriṇo jñāpitaṃ bhavatīty āha -- śaktipratibandhakāpanayanene[113.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4180: yasmād arthe 'yaṃ nipātaḥ “na vai“[nai]veti vyācakṣāṇo vai[113.25]śabdam avadhāraṇe darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4184: kathaṃ tarhi saha yugapat kurvanta [114.12] ity ayaṃ vyācaṣṭeti cet,
GSP28dhebta_u:4185: uktam atra pūrvam iti na punar ucyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4188: yāvate[115.8]ti tṛtīyāntapratirūpako 'yaṃ nipāto yasmād ity asminn arthe,
GSP28dhebta_u:4191: tadavasthāyā prāk pūrvaṃ paścād uttarakālaṃ[136]pṛthak tadvikalāvasthāyāṃ bhāvaḥ [115.10] sadbhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4195: nanu yadi svahetoḥ samarthasyotpattis tarhi katham anantaram uktam -- “te samarthāḥ svabhāvataḥ [115.6]” ity ata āha paramate[115.16]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4196: bhavatyasmāt kāryam iti bhāvo hetus tasmād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4197: tad api tvayā kasmān na vyākhyātam iti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4198: na, sa[49a]1marthaḥ kuta utpanna ity asya vyāghātaprasaṃgāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4199: sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthyam[137]icchantī[115.17]ti camīmāṃsakamatāśrayaṇenāha na tunaiyāyikāevam icchanti yena tanmatopagraheṇāpy etat saṃgaccheta,
GSP28dhebta_u:4201: tathā cāha --jalpamahodaghiḥ“sahakārisākalyaṃ tadvataḥ sāmarthyaṃ vaikalyaṃ tv asāmarthyam” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4206: āvaśyakaṃ[138]jananam i[116.11]ty asya śabdasya tu siddhiḥ[139]pūrvaṃ na jāne /
GSP28dhebta_u:4209: [139] draṣṭavyam -- pṛ. 354 paṃ. 8 -- “avaśyamo bhāvaḥ ityādinā na jāne ityantena kṛtā“,
GSP28dhebta_u:4212: kuśūlañ ca tadapanetṛpuruṣaprayatnaś ca kṣetranayanaṃ ca prakiraṇaṃ [116.14] ca prakaraṇāt kṣetre prakiraṇaṃ ceti dvandvaṃ kṛtvā paścād ādiśabde[na] bahuvrīhiḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4213: prakiraṇam ity ayam auṇādikaḥ śabdo na tu kiratirlyuḍanto draṣṭavyas tadā guṇasyāpratiṣedhena prakaraṇam iti prāpter asādhu3tvaprasaṃgāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4214: sametya [116.19] yogyadeśe sthitvā sambhūya ādyena saha militvā pratyayaiḥ sahakāryupādānarūpaiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4215: nanu ca “ata eva tayor avasthayor” ityādinā pratyabhijñāyāḥ prāmāṇyam apoditam eva tat kathaṃ na punar ukte(ktam i)
GSP28dhebta_u:4219: tarhi kim arthaṃ punar uktam ity āha -- vipañcanārthaṃ tv i[117.12]ti tuḥ pūrvasmād asya kathanasya viśeṣaṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4221: paścād bāhyepi darśayitavyatvāt krame tāvac śabdam āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4225: kathaṃ tādṛśo na bhavatīty āha anyādṛśād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4226: anyādṛśāddhi bhavannanyādṛśasyāpi hetor hetuvyapadeśasaṃbhavāj jananahetur ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4227: kathaṃ taddhetur ity āha tad iti tatsahakāribhiḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayahetusahakāribhir indriyādibhiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4228: 6samarthañ ca tadvijñānajanane svasvakṣaṇāntaraṃ ceti tathā tasyārambhāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4233: vijñānanirmāṇasamarthāś ca te hetavaś ca te ca te indriyādayaś ca teṣām upādānaiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4239: sukhasaṃvarditatvād iti vyācakṣāṇo mūle sukhaidhita ity asyānabhiyoganimittasyāpi sāmarthyāt krīḍana[119.12]śīla ity asya hetubhāvena 8viśeṣaṇatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4240: nanu kṛtaṃ niṣpāditam ucyate 'tra ca kimācāryeṇa niṣpāditam ity āśaṃkāṃ nirākurvann āha kṛtam i[119.14]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4241: na punar e[119.15]vam ācakṣāṇena dvir uktābhāvo darśita iti boddhavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4242: asyārthasyāsakṛduktatvāt ekavāraṃ prativihite punaḥ pratividhāpayitari avajñāsaṃbhavenopahāsāṃyogāc ca kṛtaṃ kṛtam iti nirdeśasya nyā[49b]1yaprāptatvād atiprasiddhatvāc ceti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4243: nanu kiṃ kurvantaṃ kartuṃ prayuṅkte punaḥ pūrvapakṣavādī yena punaḥ pūrvapakṣavādī kārayatīty ucyata ity āha -- punar ityādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4245: pūrvavan mīmāṃsakābhiprāyeṇa sāmarthyaṃ sahakāribhyo jāyata [119.25] ity ācaṣṭe /
GSP28dhebta_u:4247: {p. 358} samprati prakārāntareṇāpi pratyabhijñāyā aprāmāṇyaṃ paramabhyupagamayituṃ bhūmikāṃ racayann āha -- vyāvasthitasyaive[120.12]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4248: ayaṃ cātrābhiprāyaḥ -- bhavatu yāvad bījādāvucchūnoccūnatarādiviśeṣasya darśanāt sāmarthyotpādādikalpanā na punar iha tathā adarśanād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4251: apratibhāsamāno viveko [120.14] yasya puṃ3saḥ sa tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:4252: yady api viveko 'sya pratyakṣato nāvagamyate tathāpy etasmāt pramāṇāt tatsvabhāvasya sāmarthyasyotpattiḥ kalpyata iti darśayann āha vijñānādī[120.15]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4253: anutpattiprasaṃgāt prāgasatsāmarthyaṃ cakṣurādisannidhāv utpadyata iti niścayaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4258: apūrvasāmarthyasya yaḥ pratibhāsa ākāras tena vivikto rahito ya upalādis tadgrāhi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4259: yata evaivaṃ tata evāvikṛtam iti ca draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4261: abhyupagamyatām evaṃ kā kṣatir ity āha tatheti tadvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:4263: dvividhaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ prātisvikam āgantukañ ca /
GSP28dhebta_u:4265: anyathā śilāśakalam api kṣityādisānnidhye bījavadaṃkuraṃ kasmān na niva(rva)
GSP28dhebta_u:4266: rtayatīti paryanuyoge kim uttaraṃ vācyam iti hi teṣāṃ matam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4267: nanu sāmarthyam atiśayalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāryādheyaṃ tato 'nyad eva tat ka6thaṃ “sahakāripratyaya[sānnidhya]lakṣaṇasye“ty ucyata ity āha ata[141]eve[121.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4269: sānnidhyaśabdaparityāgena sahakāripratyayalakṣaṇasyeti te evetyādy apy uktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4270: ata evābhyupagamād i[121.3]ti upāgatābhyupagamād i7ti pratyetavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4278: idaṃ śabdasya caitad iti etad darśanam [121.21] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4280: evaṃ niyuñjānamaho mahāsāmarthyam astu kā tavākṣamety āśaṃkya yadi nāmety avatārayituṃ na cātre[121.25]tyādy āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4281: na cātra me kācid akṣamā [121.25] kiṃtv itīyam asmākaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunotī[122.3]ti samba8ndhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4282: na cātra me [121.25] ity anena ṭīkākāravacanenaikavākyīkaraṇapakṣety a(pya)
GSP28dhebta_u:4285: evam asaṃbaddhavādiny apūjya eva pūjāvacanam upasaṃhāraparaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4286: dainyodbhāvanam i[122.1]ty arthāt saṃbodhyamānasya dainyaprakāśanam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4289: apeto 'pagataḥ saṃtānaḥ [122.2] prasūtiḥ paraṃparā yasya tathoktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4291: śiraḥkampe cāsya satyam idam astī[122.10]ty asya śabdasya prayogam ākalayya prayoktur abhiprāyaṃ varṇayan pṛcchatī[122.13]ty ācaṣṭe /
GSP28dhebta_u:4292: ata eva cedam āha -- kiṃ tvayāstitvena pṛcchyata iti pārśvasthaṃ praśnayann āha kiṃ tad i[122.13]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4294: audāsīnyāpattir ity atreti śabdena idam āstitvenābhipretasya nyāyyavacana[122.17]syākāro darśitaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4295: ata eva nyāyyavacanasyāstitvena darśyamānasya rūpaṃ darśayan satym idam apy astī[122.16]ti punar āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4296: yady evam asya nyāyyavacanasya sadbhāvādanavadyam evāsmanmatam ity āśaṃ3kyāha kiṃtv i[122.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4298: pracyutam ajanakaṃ rūpam utpannaṃ janakaṃ rūpaṃ dvandvaikavadbhāvam abhipretya pracyutotpannam ity āha -- apracyuto(tā)
GSP28dhebta_u:4302: aparāpekṣasvabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvād i[123.20]ti parā4pekṣo yaḥ svabhāvabhedo na bhavati svata eva yo bhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4305: svarūpeṇa kartṛtve vivakṣitasyāpi tādrūpya prasajyetety abhiprāyeṇāha e[144]ṣām api pararūpeṇa kartṛtva [124.1] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4306: pararūpeṇa kartṛtve iti para eva kartā syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4307: tasya tu tathātvaṃ5 harītakīṃ prāpya devatā recayantīty anena tulyaṃ syād ity abhipretyāha -- pararūpeṇāpy akārakatvād i[124.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4308: asyottarasya [124.5] “sahitas tatsvabhāvo na kevala” ity asya /
GSP28dhebta_u:4310: kathañcit ke[124.10]nāpi prakāreṇa na kāryakriyāyā virāmaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4311: purastād api tasya svarūpasya bhāvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4315: 6syād etaj janakam asya rūpam avasthitaṃ janakañ ca tad ucyate yasmin saty eva kāryam asti na tu yasmin sati kāryaṃ bhavaty eva,
GSP28dhebta_u:4319: ve {p. 360} nopapadyeta ity eva tasya kāryaṃ,
GSP28dhebta_u:4320: tadbhāve tu bhavaty avaśyam iti ko(kvo)payogo 'sya /
GSP28dhebta_u:4321: tasmāt kathaṃ tadrūpabhāvepi kāryakriyā7 prasaṃjanaṃ jyāya iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4322: atrocyate akṣaṇikatvenāpracyutānutpannarūpāntare sarvāvasthāsamāne 'pi kāraṇaṃ yadi kāryaṃ nopajāyate tarhi tatsvatantram āpadyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:4323: tathā ca na tat tasya kāryaṃ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4326: svatantraṃ kāryam eva syān na [tat]kāryaṃ tathā 8sati //” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4327: kāraṇapāratantrye ca tatkāraṇaṃ tatkāryaṃ haṭhād eva janayet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4328: tathāpy abhāve na tasya kāryaṃ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4329: tasmād a[kāraṇāt] kāraṇasya viśeṣaḥ kāryasyāvaśyaṃbhāva evāvaśyañ ca vaktavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4331: ve na bhavati kāryam” ity akāraṇād asya viśeṣaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4332: na hi tasyākāraṇasyābhāve tatkāryaṃ na bhavatīti,
GSP28dhebta_u:4333: hanta kuta etad avagamyate tada[50b]1bhāvaprayukto 'syābhāva iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4335: vasyābhāve tadbhāvalakṣaṇe kāryābhāvasyābhāvaḥ kāryabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ syāt tadā tadabhāvaprayukto 'syābhāvaḥ siddhyed itarathākāraṇābhimatābhāvaprayukto 'pi tadabhāvaḥ kiṃ na kalpyate?
GSP28dhebta_u:4338: tasmād yathā 2tadavastha eva kāraṇe svayam eva kāryaṃ na bhavati svātantryāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:4339: tathā tadabhāvo 'pi svayam eva na bhaviṣyatīti svātantryād eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:4340: yaś ca svayam eva na bhavati nāsau niyamyata tena paratantratve tasya kāraṇasya bhāve 'vaśyam eva bhavet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4345: “[146]tadbhāvepi na bhāvaś ced abhāve bhāvitā kutaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4350: tasmāt tadbhāve bhāvas tadabhāve cābhāva iti viśeṣitaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'vaśyaṃ bhavatīti jñāpayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4351: tathā ca kāraṇe saty avaśyaṃbhāvi kāryam āyātam iti kathaṃ kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4352: kiñ ca tathāvidho hi kāryābhāvo nirhetukatvāt svayam eva bhavatīti yuktam api /
GSP28dhebta_u:4353: bhāvas tu hetuparatantratvāt sa4marthe hetau na bhavatīti na yuktam / tad uktam
GSP28dhebta_u:4354: “abhāvo hi padārthānāṃ svayam eva bhaved api /
GSP28dhebta_u:4355: bhāvas tu paratantratvāt kathaṃ hetor bhaven na saḥ //” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4356: {p. 361} nanu kāryābhāvasya svatantratvāt “kāraṇe saty eva na bhavatī“ti yuktam evaitat /
GSP28dhebta_u:4357: evaṃ tarhi na kāraṇābhāva prayukto 'bhāva kathaṃ bhavet kāryasya(kāryam[147]asya)
GSP28dhebta_u:4359: yaś ca svayam eva na bhavati nāsau tena niyantuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4360: tato yathā svayaṃ na bhavati tathā bhaved api /
GSP28dhebta_u:4362: yadā tu kāraṇe sati bhaved eva tadā svarasanirodhepy aparāparakṣaṇotpattes tadabhāva eva saṃtānocchedas tadabhāva eva ca saṃtānākṣepakṣaṇānārambho vā su6jñāta(na)
GSP28dhebta_u:4367: etena tad api nirastamyadāhur eke yathobhayādhīnanirūpaṇā vyāptir ayogavyavacchedena vyāpake nirūpyate vyāpye sati bhāva eva vyāpakasya nābhāva iti;
GSP28dhebta_u:4368: vyāpyasya punar anyayogavyavacchedena vyāpaka eva bhāvo vyāpyasya nānyatreti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4370: kāryotpādasya purastād bhāva eva kāraṇasya nābhāva iti;
GSP28dhebta_u:4371: kārye punar anyayogavyavacchedena kāraṇa eva sati bhāvo nānyasminn ity anubhavānusārānniścīyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4376: kāraṇasya mukhyasyānubhavo 'nyas tu tādarthyād upacaritakāraṇabhāvasyānubhava iti svayam upacaritakāraṇānubhavarūpatva eveti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4377: api ca yathā kāraṇe saty avaśyaṃ bhāvam anicchatā kāryasya kādācit kādanvayāt tatkāra[51a] 1ṇam iṣyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4378: tathā kādācit kādavyatirekād api kin na kāraṇam iṣyate yujyate vā /
GSP28dhebta_u:4379: tasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ niyatam icchatā yathā vyāptimān vyatireka eṣṭavyas tathā vyāptimānn anva(mān anva)
GSP28dhebta_u:4381: kiṃ ca sahitāvasthāyāṃ tāvad asau bhāvaḥ kāryaṃ janayatītīṣyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4385: yady utaraḥ pakṣas tadā tasmiñ janayati na kadācit kāryaṃ satpratyayaviṣayaḥ syāt sattayā abhisambandhasya bhāvitatvā(vitvā)t /
GSP28dhebta_u:4388: kim anenaiva svabhāvena pūrvam ayam avasthito 'thānyena /
GSP28dhebta_u:4391: 3anenaiva svabhāvenāvasthāne ca saṃpratīva tadāpi kāryaṃ sattayābhisambadhyata ity upetaṃ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4395: kiṃ prāgbhāva eva kiṃ vā prāg eva bhāvaḥ?
GSP28dhebta_u:4397: tadā sthirasyāpi evam eva kāraṇatve su[148]sādhitasya4 nirākaraṇaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:4400: tad eva tu na siddham iti {p. 362} katham idam ucyamānaṃ śobheteti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4401: āstāṃ prāgbhāva eva kāraṇatvaṃ ko bādhaḥ?
GSP28dhebta_u:4402: nanūktam evākṣaṇikasyāpi kāraṇatve sādhayituṃ śakye tadanirākṛtir eva mahatī bādheti ceti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4403: hanta kiṃ 5heturūpasya lakṣaṇenākṣaṇikasya sattvaṃtathāgatair nirākriyate yenedam api vaktum adhyavasitās tarkavidaḥ kathaṃ nāmeti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4405: prāgbhāva evāsau sthirarūpāt kramākramākhyasya vyāpakasya nivṛttyā nivartate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4406: yathā ca tasya tābhyāṃ vyāptir yathā ca tatas tayor nivṛttis tathānyatra niṛṇītam iti ne6ha hetulakṣaṇakāle 'prakṛtatvād ucyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4409: na tu hetulakṣaṇena tasyā nirākṛtir iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4415: [tya]ity e[123.21]kena prakāreṇa vyākhyāyāpareṇāpi prakāreṇa vyākhyātum athave[124.10]tyādinopakramate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4420: nanūktam eva pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryajananasvabhāvo bhāvas tat kathaṃ pratyayāntarasāhityadaśāyāḥ pūrvaṃ kuryād ity āha pratyayāntare[124.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4422: kecit punaḥ “svahetubhir evāyaṃ pratyayāntarasāpekṣakāryajananasvabhāvo janita [124.11]” ity atraiva vipañcyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4423: 8yady evaṃdharmo 'yaṃ svahetubhir eva janitaḥ syāt tadā na kadācij janayet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4424: tathā hi yāvat sahakāripratyayasannidhikālas tāvad akaraṇadharmāsau bhāvo 'nyathāsyā pūrvam api kartṛtvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:4425: pratyayāntarasannidhikāle ca sa eva kiyatkālākaraṇasvabhāvo yaḥ prathame kṣaṇa āsīt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4426: tato naiva kuryāt ki[51b]1yatkālākaraṇadharmatvāt tasya kriyāyāt (kriyāyāṃtu)
GSP28dhebta_u:4430: punar ante tathaiveti katham ivākṣaṇikaḥ kadācid api janayet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4431: tasmān na pratyayāntarāpekṣajanakasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ svahetubhir janyata iti / tathā cāha --
GSP28dhebta_u:4433: bhāvaḥ syāj janito nāsau kiṃcij janayet tadā //
GSP28dhebta_u:4435: tāvan nūnam akartāsau svabhāvas tasya vastunaḥ //
GSP28dhebta_u:4438: tan na kuryāt kriyāyām vā svabhāvosya no bhavet (?) /
GSP28dhebta_u:4441: svabhāvasya tathāpy eṣa tāvat kālam asatkriyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4442: punar ante tathaiveti kuryād akṣaṇikaḥ katham? //” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4449: santānam apy āśritya katham ucyata ity āha -- pūrvottareti [128.8] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4450: kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāma vastu4tas tatra sahakāritvam ity āha -- pūrva[151]kṣaṇebhyas tv i[128.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4457: ekatvenādhim uktasya [130.6] tad evedam iti niścitasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:4462: upanipatantīti upanipātās te ca kṣaṇāḥ [130.13] tathā kṣaṇo yato 'nyo nāsti kālaḥ sovacchedakatvenaiṣāṃ vidyata 5iti “[154]arṣa ādi“ty enad vidhātavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4472: kiṃtu durvekena anyad eva kiñcid uddhata bhāti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4473: tathā ca atra “arṣa ādibhyo 'dityanenād vidhātavyaḥ” iti pāṭhaḥ samyak sambhāvyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4475: tadanāsādanam eva katham ity āha -- kṣaṇānām i[130.27]ti6 /
GSP28dhebta_u:4476: ayaṃ niratiśayo 'yaṃ ca sātiśaya iti vivekasyābhāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4478: yad uktam akṣaṇike tatsarvaṃ kṣaṇikeṣv api mamaṃ yata [131.10] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4480: yad vā kṣaṇānām i[131.13]tīdam ubhayatrāpi sambandhanīyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4483_0: dūradeśavartināṃ kathaṃ hetuphalabhāvapratiniyama ity āśaṃkāyāṃ nyāyam upadarśayann
GSP28dhebta_u:4483_1: āha yena yasyābhī[131.16]ti yena dūrasthitasahakārikṛtena viśeṣeṇa saviśeṣā eva saṃnidhīyanta itīṣyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4485: {p. 364} naiva kāryotpādane yogyās te 'smābhir iṣyante kiṃ tarhi kāryotpādānuguṇasyotpā8dane tat kathaṃ tadupāyetyādy ucyamānaṃ śobhetety āśaṃkyāha yadi hi [132.5] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4487: kiṃ puna[132.22]r hi dvistrir vā brūmaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4488: kiṃ tarhi śataśa eva brūma ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4489: saṃpratyevam eva vyākhyānasya niravadyatayāpūrvaṭīkākṛtaḥkaṭākṣayann āha -- evam i[132.23]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4491: na viśeṣotpādanād evetyādigranthasya punar uktatāpari[52a]1hārārthaṃ yatante yatnaṃ kurvanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4494: na sarvadāparāparayogosya saṃbhavati yenāsya tannibandhano viśeṣaḥ kalpyata ity āha nahī[133.22]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4496: chāyāpi śītādyarthakriyākāriṇī vastv eva tv anā(na tv ā)
GSP28dhebta_u:4498: na tu pratikṣaṇam ityādinā ekadaivārthasyoktatvāt kathaṃ dviḥ punar grahaṇaṃ kṛtam ity āha kṣaṇikeṣv i[133.29]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4500: (Pā. 5-4-18) sucakenoktam ity āha tatra svarasata [134.2] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4501: tajjanmanimittam ity ācakṣāṇo mūle nimittasaptamīṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4507: yasmin kārye kartavye 'nukūlo 'nuguṇaḥ sa cāsau viśeṣaś ceti tathā āsād itas tadanukūlo viśeṣo yais te tathā taiḥ [136.28] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4508: atha kena granthena pūrvam anavasthoktā kathaṃ ca syād iti pārśvasthavacanam āśaṃkya taṃ prāguktaṃ granthaṃ tasya cārthaṃ darśayann āha athe[137.1]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4510: kuśūlādyavastham api bījaṃ kṣityādinā kṛtaviśeṣaṃ kṣityādikam api tena kṛtaviśeṣam evopatiṣṭhata ity asya praka[156]raṇa(kāra)

GSP28dhebta_u:6029_0: paramārthato bhedo nāsti [226.10] iti bruvato8yaṃ bhāvaḥ tasmin saty eva bhāvo bhavitṛtvaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:6029_1: tadabhāvo cābhāva evābhavitṛtvaṃ evam eva hetoḥ svagata evāyaṃ dharmo 'ta eva yatrānvayas
GSP28dhebta_u:6029_2: tatra vyatireka iti svabhāvahetusādhyam etad avatiṣṭhate /
GSP28dhebta_u:6032: nanu ca yady anayoḥ parasparāntarbhāvo na bhavet tarhi katham ekaṃ vākyam ubhayaṃ gamayet /
GSP28dhebta_u:6034: bhinnalakṣaṇam eva [226.15] vyāvṛttito bhinnasvabhāvam eva santaṃ tataś ca bhinnatvāt anayor liṅgarūpatvāc ca pṛthagavayavāntaratvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:6035: yady ekaḥ svabhā...............yaduktapūrvaṃ tadavastham evety āha paraspara [226.16] ityādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:6036_1: bhāvābhāvayor aparasparākṣepād iti siddhāntavādinābhihitaṃ kim anena tadapratividhāyakena
GSP28dhebta_u:6036_2: na tv i[226.17]tyādinoktena ity āśaṅkya pūrvapakṣavādimata eva ...............darśayitum
GSP28dhebta_u:6037: tadabhāvo 'bhāvo gamyate anyathā tadarthaivāsyā vākyasya na syād ityā3.........ta iti vartate /
GSP28dhebta_u:6038: pratibandhaś ca [226.22] pratibaddhatvañ ca hetor ity arthāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:6040: tadbhāve bhāvarūpa eve[226.23]ti vicārata etad avatiṣṭhate /
GSP28dhebta_u:6041: yata ity abhiprāyeṇoktaṃ ekavākyeneti pīno devadatta ityādinā tata evaikavākyā[225]ntarabhāvād i[227.17]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:6047: tadantarbhāvamātreṇa [227.18] ekavākyārthāntarbhāvamātreṇa niyamavadvākyavyapakṣeyā kadācid dṛṣṭena tadantarbhāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:6048: ekarūpāntarar bhāvāt tu dvitīyagati[227.27]r neti vartate /
GSP28dhebta_u:6049: bhinnarūpāv eve[228.6]ti yathā tayā ka5......ta tathā bhinnarūpāv eveti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6054: syād etat ye tāvat jñātatvaśabdena jñānam evābhidadhate te santūktayā nītyā nirākṛtāḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:6055: ye tu jñānakarmatvaṃ jñātatvaṃ6 .........nirākriyante ity āśaṅkāyām āha tad ayam atra [228.20] ityādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:6057: prakaraṇam upasaṃharann āha -- tad evam i[228.28]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6058: trīṇi pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekātmakāni lakṣaṇāni yasya sa tathokta iti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28dhebta_u:6059_1: ṭīkāṃ paṭīyasīm īdṛśīṃ parārtham uddiśya praṇayatā niyataṃ mayāpi kim api puṇyaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:6059_2: upārjitaṃ tad apy ahaṃ parārtham upanayām iti manvāno 'nekajanmābhyastakṛpāyogāt
GSP28dhebta_u:6060: asyāyaṃ samudāyā[rthaḥ 8munīśarādddhā]ntanayapradīpam [229.2] vivṛ[226]tya yat puṇyam upārjitaṃ tat jagato viśuddhiṃ vidheyāt [229.3] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6061: kāyavāṅmanomaunayogān munayaḥ pratyekabuddhādayas teṣāṃ īśaḥ śāstā buddho bhagavān savāsanakleśaparihāṇiyogenāta(?)
GSP28dhebta_u:6062_0: bhyas tasya prakarṣaprāptayā tāyitvāt tasya nayo nītiḥ pravacanaṃ tasya rāddhāntaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:6062_2: yathāvatprakāśanāt kutsitaḥ pramāṇānupapannārthaprakāśanāt tarko nyāyadarśanādi[r i]ti tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:6064: tasya mārgaḥ [229.1] panthāḥ siddhānta ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:6065: kṣataḥ khaṇḍitaḥ tadvairūpyāpādanād aśeṣaḥ kutarkamārgo yena sa tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:6067: tat puṇyaṃ [229.3] kartṛ viśuddhiṃ [229.3] vimalacittasaṃtati parāṃ [229.4] prakṛṣṭāṃ sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇād iti sarvam anavadyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6073: nāstīha sūktaṃ mama yat punaḥ syāt gurorjitāreḥsa khalu prasādaḥ //
GSP28dhebta_u:6074: kutūhalenaiva yadṛcchayā vā mātsaryato doṣajighṛkṣa3[yā vā]
GSP28dhebta_u:6078: parārtham uddiśya yathārthamarcaṭaṃvivṛṇya puṇyaṃ yadupārjitaṃ mayā /
GSP28dhebta_u:6079: nihantu tenāvaraṇāni vidviṣo janontarāyeṇa vinaiva sarvathā //
